trans-unit.source: Defines and creates new instances of classes during run time.
trans-unit.target: 在运行时定义并创建类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder> is the root class used to control the creation of dynamic classes in the runtime.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder> 用于控制运行时中的动态类创建根类。

trans-unit.source: It provides a set of routines that are used to define classes, add methods and fields, and create the class inside a module.
trans-unit.target: 它提供一组用于定义类，添加方法和字段，并创建在模块内的类的例程。

trans-unit.source: A new <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder> can be created from a dynamic module by calling the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ModuleBuilder.DefineType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, which returns a <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder> object.
trans-unit.target: 一个新<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder>可以通过调用从动态模块创建<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ModuleBuilder.DefineType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，它返回<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder>对象。

trans-unit.source: Reflection emit provides the following options for defining types:
trans-unit.target: 反射发出提供用于定义类型的以下选项：

trans-unit.source: Define a class or interface with the given name.
trans-unit.target: 定义类或具有给定名称的接口。

trans-unit.source: Define a class or interface with the given name and attributes.
trans-unit.target: 定义类或具有给定名称和属性的接口。

trans-unit.source: Define a class with the given name, attributes, and base class.
trans-unit.target: 定义具有给定名称、 属性和基类的类。

trans-unit.source: Define a class with the given name, attributes, base class, and the set of interfaces that the class implements.
trans-unit.target: 定义具有给定名称、 属性、 基本类、 和的类实现的接口集的类。

trans-unit.source: Define a class with the given name, attributes, base class, and packing size.
trans-unit.target: 定义具有给定名称、 特性、 基类和封装大小的类。

trans-unit.source: Define a class with the given name, attributes, base class, and the class size as a whole.
trans-unit.target: 作为一个整体定义具有给定名称、 属性、 基本类、 和类大小的类。

trans-unit.source: Define a class with the given name, attributes, base class, packing size, and the class size as a whole.
trans-unit.target: 作为一个整体定义具有给定名称、 属性、 基类、 封装大小和类大小的类。

trans-unit.source: To create an array type, pointer type, or byref type for an incomplete type that is represented by a <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder> object, use the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.MakeArrayType%2A> method, <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.MakePointerType%2A> method, or <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.MakeByRefType%2A> method, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建数组类型、 指针类型或不完整类型表示的 byref 类型<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder>对象，请使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.MakeArrayType%2A>方法，<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.MakePointerType%2A>方法，或<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.MakeByRefType%2A>方法，分别。

trans-unit.source: Before a type is used, the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method must be called.
trans-unit.target: 使用了类型之前，<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>必须调用方法。

trans-unit.source: **CreateType** completes the creation of the type.
trans-unit.target: **CreateType**完成创建该类型。

trans-unit.source: Following the call to **CreateType**, the caller can instantiate the type by using the <xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, and invoke members of the type by using the <xref:System.Type.InvokeMember%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 以下调用**CreateType**，调用方可以通过实例化类型<xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，并使用调用类型的成员<xref:System.Type.InvokeMember%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: It is an error to invoke methods that change the implementation of a type after **CreateType** has been called.
trans-unit.target: 它是调用更改后的类型实现的方法中的错误**CreateType**已调用。

trans-unit.source: For example, the common language runtime throws an exception if the caller tries to add new members to a type.
trans-unit.target: 例如，公共语言运行时引发异常，如果调用方尝试将新成员添加到一种类型。

trans-unit.source: A class initializer is created by using the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineTypeInitializer%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 通过创建了类初始值设定项<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineTypeInitializer%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: **DefineTypeInitializer** returns a <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ConstructorBuilder> object.
trans-unit.target: **DefineTypeInitializer**返回<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ConstructorBuilder>对象。

trans-unit.source: Nested types are defined by calling one of the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineNestedType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> methods.
trans-unit.target: 嵌套的类型定义通过调用之一<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineNestedType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: Attributes
trans-unit.target: 特性

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder> class uses the <xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes> enumeration to further specify the characteristics of the type to be created:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder>类使用<xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes>枚举，以进一步指定要创建的类型的特征：

trans-unit.source: Interfaces are specified using the <xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.Interface?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.Abstract?displayProperty=nameWithType> attributes.
trans-unit.target: 接口使用指定<xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.Interface?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.Abstract?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: Concrete classes (classes that cannot be extended) are specified using the <xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.Sealed?displayProperty=nameWithType> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定具体类 （不能进行扩展的类）<xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.Sealed?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: Several attributes determine type visibility.
trans-unit.target: 多个特性确定类型可见性。

trans-unit.source: See the description of the <xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅说明<xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes>枚举。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.SequentialLayout?displayProperty=nameWithType> is specified, the class loader lays out fields in the order they are read from metadata.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.SequentialLayout?displayProperty=nameWithType>指定，则类加载程序布局中，将在读取从元数据的顺序的字段。

trans-unit.source: The class loader considers the specified packing size but ignores any specified field offsets.
trans-unit.target: 类加载程序会将指定的封装大小，但忽略任何指定的字段偏移量。

trans-unit.source: The metadata preserves the order in which the field definitions are emitted.
trans-unit.target: 元数据保留在其中发出的字段定义的顺序。

trans-unit.source: Even across a merge, the metadata will not reorder the field definitions.
trans-unit.target: 即使在合并时，元数据不重新排序的字段定义。

trans-unit.source: The loader will honor the specified field offsets only if <xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.ExplicitLayout?displayProperty=nameWithType> is specified.
trans-unit.target: 加载程序将遵循指定的字段偏移量仅当<xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.ExplicitLayout?displayProperty=nameWithType>指定。

trans-unit.source: Known Issues
trans-unit.target: 已知问题

trans-unit.source: Reflection emit does not verify whether a non-abstract class that implements an interface has implemented all the methods declared in the interface.
trans-unit.target: 反射发出不验证的非抽象类的实现的接口是否实现该接口中声明的所有方法。

trans-unit.source: However, if the class does not implement all the methods declared in an interface, the runtime does not load the class.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果类未实现接口中声明的所有方法，则运行时不加载类。

trans-unit.source: Although <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder> is derived from <xref:System.Type>, some of the abstract methods defined in the <xref:System.Type> class are not fully implemented in the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder> class.
trans-unit.target: 尽管<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder>派生自<xref:System.Type>，某些中定义的抽象方法<xref:System.Type>类中未完全实现<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder>类。

trans-unit.source: Calls to these <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder> methods throw a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 对这些调用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder>方法将引发<xref:System.NotSupportedException>异常。

trans-unit.source: The desired functionality can be obtained by retrieving the created type using the <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and reflecting on the retrieved type.
trans-unit.target: 通过检索创建的类型使用，可获得所需的功能<xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和反映将检索到的类型。

trans-unit.source: This section contains two code examples.
trans-unit.target: 本部分包含两个代码示例。

trans-unit.source: The first example shows how to create a dynamic type with a field, constructor, property, and method.
trans-unit.target: 第一个示例演示如何创建具有字段、 构造函数、 属性和方法的动态类型。

trans-unit.source: The second example builds a method dynamically from user input.
trans-unit.target: 第二个示例生成动态从用户输入的方法。

trans-unit.source: **Example one**
The following code example shows how to define a dynamic assembly with one module.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何定义具有一个模块的动态程序集。

trans-unit.source: The module in the example assembly contains one type, `MyDynamicType`, which has a private field, a property that gets and sets the private field, constructors that initialize the private field, and a method that multiplies a user-supplied number by the private field value and returns the result.
trans-unit.target: 该示例程序集中的模块包含一个类型， `MyDynamicType`，它具有私有字段、 一个属性，获取和设置私有字段、 初始化该私有字段的构造函数和乘以私有字段的用户提供的数字的方法值并返回结果。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilderAccess.RunAndSave?displayProperty=nameWithType> field is specified when the assembly is created.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilderAccess.RunAndSave?displayProperty=nameWithType>创建程序集时指定字段。

trans-unit.source: The assembly code is used immediately, and the assembly is also saved to disk so that it can be examined with [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) or used in another program.
trans-unit.target: 立即，使用程序集代码和程序集也将保存到磁盘，以便它可以检查与[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)或在另一个程序中使用。

trans-unit.source: **Example two**
trans-unit.target: **第二个示例**

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates how to build a dynamic type by using `TypeBuilder`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何通过使用构建一个动态类型`TypeBuilder`。

trans-unit.source: The security action to be taken such as Demand, Assert, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 要执行的安全操作，如 Demand、Assert 等。

trans-unit.source: The set of permissions the action applies to.
trans-unit.target: 应用此操作的权限集。

trans-unit.source: Adds declarative security to this type.
trans-unit.target: 将声明性安全添加到此类型。

trans-unit.source: `AddDeclarativeSecurity` may be called several times with each call specifying a security action (such as Demand, Assert, or Deny) and a set of permissions that apply to the action.
trans-unit.target: `AddDeclarativeSecurity` 不能调用多次指定安全性操作 （如需、 Assert 或 Deny） 和一组应用于操作的权限的每次调用。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework versions 1.0, 1.1, and 2.0, the declarative security attributes applied to a type by using this method are stored in the old XML metadata format.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 版本 1.0、 1.1 和 2.0 中，使用此方法应用于类型的声明性安全属性存储在旧的 XML 元数据格式。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the use of the `AddDeclarativeSecurity` method to add a security demand for <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission> with the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlEvidence?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag to a dynamic type named `MyDynamicClass`, in an assembly named EmittedExample.dll.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示了利用`AddDeclarativeSecurity`方法将添加的安全要求<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission>与<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlEvidence?displayProperty=nameWithType>到名为的动态类型的标志`MyDynamicClass`，在名为 EmittedExample.dll 的程序集中。

trans-unit.source: The example produces no console output; after you run it, you can use [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to examine EmittedExample.dll.
trans-unit.target: 该示例生成没有控制台输出;在运行后，你可以使用[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)检查 EmittedExample.dll。

trans-unit.source: In `MyDynamicClass`, open the `.class public auto ansi` statement to see the declarative permission.
trans-unit.target: 在`MyDynamicClass`，打开`.class public auto ansi`语句，以查看声明性的权限。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="action" /> is invalid (<see langword="RequestMinimum" />, <see langword="RequestOptional" />, and <see langword="RequestRefuse" /> are invalid).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="action" /> 无效（<see langword="RequestMinimum" />、<see langword="RequestOptional" /> 和 <see langword="RequestRefuse" /> 无效）。

trans-unit.source: The containing type has been created using <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType" />.
trans-unit.target: 已使用 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType" /> 创建包含类型。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The permission set <paramref name="pset" /> contains an action that was added earlier by <see langword="AddDeclarativeSecurity" />.
trans-unit.target: 权限集 <paramref name="pset" /> 包含之前由 <see langword="AddDeclarativeSecurity" /> 添加的操作。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="pset" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="pset" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The interface that this type implements.
trans-unit.target: 此类型实现的接口。

trans-unit.source: Adds an interface that this type implements.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个此类型实现的接口。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates the implementation of an interface on a dynamically created type using `AddInterfaceImplementation`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何动态创建的类型使用的接口的实现`AddInterfaceImplementation`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="interfaceType" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="interfaceType" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The type was previously created using <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType" />.
trans-unit.target: 该类型是以前使用 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType" /> 创建的。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the dynamic assembly that contains this type definition.
trans-unit.target: 检索包含此类型定义的动态程序集。

trans-unit.source: Read-only.
trans-unit.target: 只读。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the dynamic assembly that contains this type definition.
trans-unit.target: 检索包含此类型定义的动态程序集。

trans-unit.source: Returns the full name of this type qualified by the display name of the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 返回由程序集的显示名称限定的此类型的全名。

trans-unit.source: Read-only.
trans-unit.target: 只读。

trans-unit.source: The full name of this type qualified by the display name of the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 由程序集的显示名称限定的此类型的全名。

trans-unit.source: The format of the returned string is the concatenation of the full name of the type (<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.FullName%2A>) and the display name of the assembly (<xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName.FullName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>), separated by a comma and a space.
trans-unit.target: 返回字符串的格式为类型的完整名称的串联 (<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.FullName%2A>) 和程序集的显示名称 (<xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName.FullName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>)、 逗号和空格分隔。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName> for a description of the format of the display name of an assembly.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName>有关程序集的显示名称的格式的说明。

trans-unit.source: Version Information
trans-unit.target: 版本信息

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, the value of this property does not include the culture or public key.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，此属性的值不包括区域性或公钥。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the base type of this type.
trans-unit.target: 检索此类型的基类型。

trans-unit.source: Read-only.
trans-unit.target: 只读。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the base type of this type.
trans-unit.target: 检索此类型的基类型。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object for the class.
trans-unit.target: 创建类的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: After defining fields and methods on the class, <see langword="CreateType" /> is called in order to load its <see langword="Type" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 定义了类的字段和方法后，调用 <see langword="CreateType" /> 以加载其 <see langword="Type" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns the new <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object for this class.
trans-unit.target: 为此类返回新的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: If this type is a nested type, the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType%2A> method must be called on the enclosing type before it is called on the nested type.
trans-unit.target: 如果此类型是嵌套的类型，<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType%2A>嵌套类型上调用之前必须在封闭类型上调用方法。

trans-unit.source: If the current type derives from an incomplete type or implements incomplete interfaces, call the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType%2A> method on the parent type and the interface types before calling it on the current type.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前的类型派生自不完整类型或实现不完整的接口，调用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType%2A>的父类型以及在当前的类型上调用它之前的接口类型的方法。

trans-unit.source: If the enclosing type contains a field that is a value type defined as a nested type (for example, a field that is an enumeration defined as a nested type), calling the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType%2A> method on the enclosing type will generate a <xref:System.AppDomain.TypeResolve?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果封闭类型包含的字段的值类型定义为嵌套类型 （例如，是一个枚举定义为嵌套类型的字段），调用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType%2A>封闭类型的方法将生成<xref:System.AppDomain.TypeResolve?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: This is because the loader cannot determine the size of the enclosing type until the nested type has been completed.
trans-unit.target: 这是因为加载程序无法确定的封闭类型的大小，直到完成后的嵌套的类型。

trans-unit.source: The caller should define a handler for the <xref:System.AppDomain.TypeResolve> event to complete the definition of the nested type by calling <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType%2A> on the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder> object that represents the nested type.
trans-unit.target: 调用方应定义的处理程序<xref:System.AppDomain.TypeResolve>事件，以通过调用完成的嵌套类型的定义<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType%2A>上<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder>对象，表示嵌套的类型。

trans-unit.source: The code example for this topic shows how to define such an event handler.
trans-unit.target: 本主题的代码示例演示如何定义此类事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: A type is created only once, no matter how many times the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个类型是一次，无论多次<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType%2A>调用方法。

trans-unit.source: All calls return the same <xref:System.Type> object.
trans-unit.target: 所有调用都返回相同<xref:System.Type>对象。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to define an event handler for the <xref:System.AppDomain.TypeResolve?displayProperty=nameWithType> event, in order to call the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType%2A> method on a nested type during a <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType%2A> call on the enclosing type.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何定义的事件处理程序<xref:System.AppDomain.TypeResolve?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件，以便调用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType%2A>期间一个嵌套类型上的方法<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType%2A>在封闭类型上调用。

trans-unit.source: The enclosing type has not been created.
trans-unit.target: 尚未创建封闭类型。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: This type is non-abstract and contains an abstract method.
trans-unit.target: 此类型是非抽象类型，且包含一个抽象方法。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: This type is not an abstract class or an interface and has a method without a method body.
trans-unit.target: 此类型不是抽象类或接口，并且具有一个没有方法体的方法。

trans-unit.source: The type contains invalid Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) code.
trans-unit.target: 此类型包含无效的 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 代码。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The branch target is specified using a 1-byte offset, but the target is at a distance greater than 127 bytes from the branch.
trans-unit.target: 分支目标使用 1 个字节的偏移量指定，但目标离分支的距离大于 127 个字节。

trans-unit.source: The type cannot be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 无法加载此类型。

trans-unit.source: For example, it contains a <see langword="static" /> method that has the calling convention <see cref="F:System.Reflection.CallingConventions.HasThis" />.
trans-unit.target: 例如，它包含具有调用约定 <see cref="F:System.Reflection.CallingConventions.HasThis" /> 的 <see langword="static" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Reflection.TypeInfo" /> object that represents this type.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个表示此类型的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.TypeInfo" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents this type.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示此类型的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the method that declared the current generic type parameter.
trans-unit.target: 获取声明了当前泛型类型参数的方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodBase" /> that represents the method that declared the current type, if the current type is a generic type parameter; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前的类型是一个泛型类型参数，则为表示声明了当前类型的方法的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodBase" />；否则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: When emitting code, a generic type parameter is represented by a <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.GenericTypeParameterBuilder> object rather than by a <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder> object.
trans-unit.target: 在发出代码时，由表示泛型类型参数<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.GenericTypeParameterBuilder>对象而不是<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder>对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns the type that declared this type.
trans-unit.target: 返回声明此类型的类型。

trans-unit.source: Read-only.
trans-unit.target: 只读。

trans-unit.source: The type that declared this type.
trans-unit.target: 声明此类型的类型。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new constructor to the dynamic type.
trans-unit.target: 将新的构造函数添加到动态类型。

trans-unit.source: The attributes of the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 构造函数的属性。

trans-unit.source: The calling convention of the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 构造函数的调用约定。

trans-unit.source: The parameter types of the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 构造函数的参数类型。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new constructor to the type, with the given attributes and signature.
trans-unit.target: 用给定的属性和签名，向类型中添加新的构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The defined constructor.
trans-unit.target: 定义构造函数。

trans-unit.source: If you do not define a constructor for your dynamic type, a default constructor is provided automatically, and it calls the default constructor of the base class.
trans-unit.target: 如果为动态类型未定义构造函数，自动提供默认构造函数，它会调用基类的默认构造函数。

trans-unit.source: If you define a constructor for your dynamic type, a default constructor is not provided.
trans-unit.target: 如果为动态类型定义的构造函数，不提供默认构造函数。

trans-unit.source: You have the following options for providing a default constructor in addition to the constructor you defined:
trans-unit.target: 必须提供默认构造函数除了你定义的构造函数的以下选项：

trans-unit.source: If you want a default constructor that simply calls the default constructor of the base class, you can use the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineDefaultConstructor%2A> method to create one (and optionally restrict access to it).
trans-unit.target: 如果你希望只需调用基类的默认构造函数的默认构造函数，则可以使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineDefaultConstructor%2A>方法来创建一个 （也可以将访问限制到它）。

trans-unit.source: Do not provide an implementation for this default constructor.
trans-unit.target: 不提供此默认构造函数的实现。

trans-unit.source: If you do, an exception is thrown when you try to use the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如果这样做，当你尝试使用构造函数时，将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: No exception is thrown when the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 不引发异常时<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType%2A>调用方法。

trans-unit.source: If you want a default constructor that does something more than simply calling the default constructor of the base class, or that calls another constructor of the base class, or that does something else entirely, you must use the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineConstructor%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to create one, and provide your own implementation.
trans-unit.target: 如果你希望默认构造函数来执行多个只需调用基类的默认构造函数或调用另一个构造函数的基类，或执行其他操作完全，必须使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineConstructor%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法创建一个，并提供您自己的实现。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates the use of `DefineConstructor` to set a constructor's particular signature and attributes on a dynamic type and return a corresponding <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ConstructorBuilder> for MSIL population.

trans-unit.source: Each array of types represents the required custom modifiers for the corresponding parameter, such as <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.IsConst" />.
trans-unit.target: 每个类型数组均表示相应参数所必需的自定义修饰符，如 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.IsConst" />。

trans-unit.source: If a particular parameter has no required custom modifiers, specify <see langword="null" /> instead of an array of types.
trans-unit.target: 如果某个特定参数没有所需的自定义修饰符，则指定 <see langword="null" />，而不要指定类型数组。

trans-unit.source: If none of the parameters have required custom modifiers, specify <see langword="null" /> instead of an array of arrays.
trans-unit.target: 如果所有参数都没有所需的自定义修饰符，则指定 <see langword="null" />，而不要指定由数组组成的数组。

trans-unit.source: An array of arrays of types.
trans-unit.target: 由类型数组组成的数组。

trans-unit.source: Each array of types represents the optional custom modifiers for the corresponding parameter, such as <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.IsConst" />.
trans-unit.target: 每个类型数组均表示相应参数的可选自定义修饰符，如 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.IsConst" />。

trans-unit.source: If a particular parameter has no optional custom modifiers, specify <see langword="null" /> instead of an array of types.
trans-unit.target: 如果某个特定参数没有可选的自定义修饰符，则指定 <see langword="null" />，而不要指定类型数组。

trans-unit.source: If none of the parameters have optional custom modifiers, specify <see langword="null" /> instead of an array of arrays.
trans-unit.target: 如果所有参数都没有可选的自定义修饰符，则指定 <see langword="null" />，而不要指定由数组组成的数组。

trans-unit.source: Use this method overload when you do not know the method signature at the time you define the method.
trans-unit.target: 在定义的方法时不知道方法签名时，请使用此方法重载。

trans-unit.source: For example, the parameter types and return type of a generic method might be specified by the method's generic type parameters, which must be defined after the method has been added to the type.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可能由必须后该方法已添加到该类型定义的方法的泛型类型参数指定的参数类型和泛型方法的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: The parameters and return type of the method can be set later using the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetSignature%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 参数和返回类型的方法可以稍后将使用设置<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetSignature%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: This method overload defines a method with <xref:System.Reflection.CallingConventions.Standard?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法重载定义一个具有方法<xref:System.Reflection.CallingConventions.Standard?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: If you need to define a method without a signature, with a different calling convention, use the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineMethod%28System.String%2CSystem.Reflection.MethodAttributes%2CSystem.Reflection.CallingConventions%29> method overload.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要定义一个方法，无签名，使用不同调用约定，使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineMethod%28System.String%2CSystem.Reflection.MethodAttributes%2CSystem.Reflection.CallingConventions%29>方法重载。

trans-unit.source: The following code example defines a generic method named `DemoMethod` whose parameter type and return type are specified by its generic type parameters.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例定义一个名为的泛型方法`DemoMethod`由其泛型类型参数指定的参数类型和返回类型。

trans-unit.source: The method is defined without a signature, using the standard calling convention.
trans-unit.target: 该方法定义没有签名，使用标准调用约定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.DefineGenericParameters%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method is used to make `DemoMethod` a generic method, and the newly defined type parameters are then used for the signature and return type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.DefineGenericParameters%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法用于进行`DemoMethod`泛型方法，以及新定义的类型参数然后用于签名和返回类型。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.DefineGenericParameters%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.DefineGenericParameters%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: An array of types representing the optional custom modifiers, such as <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.IsConst" />, for the return type of the method.
trans-unit.target: 一个类型数组，表示该方法的返回类型的可选自定义修饰符，如 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.IsConst" />。

trans-unit.source: The types of the parameters of the method.

trans-unit.source: An array of arrays of types.
trans-unit.target: 由类型数组组成的数组。

trans-unit.source: Each array of types represents the required custom modifiers for the corresponding parameter, such as <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.IsConst" />.
trans-unit.target: 每个类型数组均表示相应参数所必需的自定义修饰符，如 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.IsConst" />。

trans-unit.source: If a particular parameter has no required custom modifiers, specify <see langword="null" /> instead of an array of types.
trans-unit.target: 如果某个特定参数没有所需的自定义修饰符，则指定 <see langword="null" />，而不要指定类型数组。

trans-unit.source: If none of the parameters have required custom modifiers, specify <see langword="null" /> instead of an array of arrays.
trans-unit.target: 如果所有参数都没有所需的自定义修饰符，则指定 <see langword="null" />，而不要指定由数组组成的数组。

trans-unit.source: An array of arrays of types.
trans-unit.target: 由类型数组组成的数组。

trans-unit.target: 每个类型数组均表示相应参数的可选自定义修饰符，如 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.IsConst" />。

trans-unit.source: If a particular parameter has no optional custom modifiers, specify <see langword="null" /> instead of an array of types.

trans-unit.source: If none of the parameters have optional custom modifiers, specify <see langword="null" /> instead of an array of arrays.
trans-unit.target: 如果所有参数都没有可选的自定义修饰符，则指定 <see langword="null" />，而不要指定由数组组成的数组。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new method to the type, with the specified name, method attributes, calling convention, method signature, and custom modifiers.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定名称、方法属性、调用约定、方法签名和自定义修饰符向类型中添加新方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder" /> object representing the newly added method.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示新添加方法的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Use this overload if you need to specify custom modifiers.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要指定自定义修饰符，请使用此重载。

trans-unit.source: If you need to specify custom modifiers after the method has been created, as you would, for example, with a generic method whose parameter types are specified by its generic type parameters, you can use the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineMethod%28System.String%2CSystem.Reflection.MethodAttributes%29> or <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineMethod%28System.String%2CSystem.Reflection.MethodAttributes%2CSystem.Reflection.CallingConventions%29> method overloads to define the method and then use the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetSignature%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to define the parameter and return types with custom modifiers.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要指定自定义修饰符，该方法已创建后, 根据需要例如，含有泛型方法的参数类型指定由其泛型类型参数，你可以使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineMethod%28System.String%2CSystem.Reflection.MethodAttributes%29>或<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineMethod%28System.String%2CSystem.Reflection.MethodAttributes%2CSystem.Reflection.CallingConventions%29>方法的重载来定义方法，然后使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetSignature%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>具有自定义修饰符的方法来定义参数和返回类型。

trans-unit.source: For more information on custom modifiers, see the ECMA Partition II Metadata documentation.
trans-unit.target: 自定义修饰符的详细信息，请参阅 ECMA Partition II 元数据文档。

trans-unit.source: The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site.
trans-unit.target: 可联机获取该文档；请参阅 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)和 Ecma International 网站上的[标准 ECMA-335 - 公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。

trans-unit.source: The method body to be used.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的方法体。

trans-unit.source: This should be a <see langword="MethodBuilder" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 应当为 <see langword="MethodBuilder" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The method whose declaration is to be used.
trans-unit.target: 要使用其声明的方法。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a given method body that implements a given method declaration, potentially with a different name.
trans-unit.target: 指定实现给定方法声明的给定方法体（可能使用其他名称）。

trans-unit.source: Do not use this method to emit method overrides or interface implementations.
trans-unit.target: 不要使用此方法以发出方法重写或接口实现。

trans-unit.source: To override a method of a base class or to implement a method of an interface, simply emit a method with the same name and signature as the method to be overridden or implemented, as demonstrated in the code example.
trans-unit.target: 若要重写基类方法或实现接口方法，只需发出具有相同名称和签名的方法作为方法重写或实现，如下面的代码示例中所示。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineMethodOverride%2A> method is used when a method body and a method declaration have different names.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineMethodOverride%2A>方法正文和一个方法声明具有不同的名称时可使用方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, a class might override a base class method and also provide a separate implementation for an interface member with the same name, as demonstrated in the code example.
trans-unit.target: 例如，一个类可能会重写基类方法，并还提供单独实现接口成员的具有相同的名称，如下面的代码示例中所示。

trans-unit.source: `DefineMethodOverride` defines a `methodimpl`, which consists of a pair of metadata tokens.
trans-unit.target: `DefineMethodOverride` 定义`methodimpl`，其中包含元数据标记的对。

trans-unit.source: One token points to an implementation, and the other token points to a declaration that the body implements.
trans-unit.target: 实现，并正文实现声明的其他令牌点到点一个令牌。

trans-unit.source: The body must be defined on the type the method impl is defined on, and the body must be virtual (`Overridable` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 必须在此方法实现定义，类型上定义正文和主体必须是虚拟 (`Overridable`在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: The declaration can be made to a method defined on an interface implemented by the type, a method on a derived class, or a method defined in the type.
trans-unit.target: 声明可为在按类型、 派生的类、 方法或类型中定义的方法实现的接口上定义的方法。

trans-unit.source: If the declaration is on an interface only, the slot defined for the interface is altered.
trans-unit.target: 如果该声明是在仅接口上，都将更改为此接口定义的槽。

trans-unit.source: If the declaration is made to a method on a base type, the slot for the method is overridden and any duplicates for the overridden method are also replaced.
trans-unit.target: 如果声明由基类型上的方法，重写该方法的槽，并还替换重写方法的任何重复项。

trans-unit.source: The overridden method cannot be the actual method that is declared.
trans-unit.target: 重写的方法不能声明的实际方法。

trans-unit.source: If the method is on the same type, the slot is replaced and any duplicates for the replaced methods are overridden.
trans-unit.target: 如果该方法是在相同的类型，替换槽，并重写的替换方法的任何重复项。

trans-unit.source: For more information about method impls, see `MethodImpl` in the ECMA Partition II Metadata documentation.
trans-unit.target: 方法 impls 有关的详细信息，请参阅`MethodImpl`ECMA Partition II 元数据文档中。

trans-unit.source: The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site.
trans-unit.target: 可联机获取该文档；请参阅 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)和 Ecma International 网站上的[标准 ECMA-335 - 公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineMethodOverride%2A> method is called, some features of `methodInfoBody` cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: 后<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineMethodOverride%2A>调用方法时，某些功能的`methodInfoBody`不能更改。

trans-unit.source: For example, you cannot apply an attribute to a generic type parameter of `methodInfoBody` by using the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.GenericTypeParameterBuilder.SetGenericParameterAttributes%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 例如，不能将特性应用于泛型类型参数的`methodInfoBody`使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.GenericTypeParameterBuilder.SetGenericParameterAttributes%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If you must use the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineMethodOverride%2A> method, do so after all characteristics of `methodInfoBody` have been defined.
trans-unit.target: 如果必须使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineMethodOverride%2A>方法，这样做的所有特性后`methodInfoBody`已定义。

trans-unit.source: The following code example contains an interface `I` with a method `M()`, a base class `A` that implements the interface, and a derived class `C` that overrides the base class implementation of `M()` and also provides a separate explicit implementation of `I.M()`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例包含一个接口`I`与方法`M()`，基类`A`实现接口，以及派生的类`C`可重写的基类实现`M()`以及提供的单独显式实现`I.M()`。

trans-unit.source: The `main()` method of the code example shows how to emit the derived class `C`.
trans-unit.target: `main()`方法中的代码示例演示如何发出派生的类`C`。

trans-unit.source: The override of `A.M()` is accomplished simply by emitting a method `M()` with the same signature.
trans-unit.target: 重写`A.M()`只需通过发出一种方法来完成`M()`具有相同签名。

trans-unit.source: However, to provide a separate implementation of `I.M()`, you must define a method body and then use the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineMethodOverride%2A> method to associate that method body with a <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> representing `I.M()`.
trans-unit.target: 但是，若要提供的单独实现`I.M()`，你必须定义的方法体，然后使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineMethodOverride%2A>方法以将该方法正文，其中含有相关联<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示`I.M()`。

trans-unit.source: The name of the method body does not matter.
trans-unit.target: 方法体的名称并不重要。

trans-unit.source: The code example creates an instance of the emitted class.
trans-unit.target: 代码示例创建发出类的实例。

trans-unit.source: It obtains a <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> object for `I.M()`, and uses it to invoke the emitted class's explicit interface implementation.
trans-unit.target: 它获取<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>对象`I.M()`，并使用它来调用发出的类的显式接口实现。

trans-unit.source: It then obtains a <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> object for `A.M()`, and uses it to invoke the emitted class's override of that method.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它获取<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>对象`A.M()`，并使用它来调用该方法发出的类重写。

trans-unit.target: 此方法可以用于创建嵌套类型后仍<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType%2A>已经对封闭类型调用方法。

trans-unit.source: The nested type needs to be complete before you can reflect on it using <xref:System.Type.GetMembers%2A>, <xref:System.Type.GetNestedType%2A>, or <xref:System.Type.GetNestedTypes%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 嵌套的类型需要在完成后才可以反映对其使用<xref:System.Type.GetMembers%2A>， <xref:System.Type.GetNestedType%2A>，或<xref:System.Type.GetNestedTypes%2A>。

trans-unit.source: See the description of <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType%2A> for the order in which nested types and nesting types should be completed.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅说明<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType%2A>嵌套的类型和嵌套类型应完成的顺序。

trans-unit.source: A duplicate name is not necessarily created if `name` is identical to the name of a previously defined type or nested type.

trans-unit.source: Defines a <see langword="PInvoke" /> method given its name, the name of the DLL in which the method is defined, the attributes of the method, the calling convention of the method, the return type of the method, the types of the parameters of the method, and the <see langword="PInvoke" /> flags.
trans-unit.target: 定义 <see langword="PInvoke" /> 方法，指定方法的名称、定义方法所使用的 DLL 的名称、方法的属性、方法的调用约定、 方法的返回类型、 方法的参数类型，以及 <see langword="PInvoke" /> 标志。

trans-unit.source: The defined <see langword="PInvoke" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 已定义的 <see langword="PInvoke" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Some DLL import attributes (see the description of <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute>) cannot be specified as arguments to this method.
trans-unit.target: 某些 DLL 导入属性 (请参阅说明<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute>) 不能指定为此方法的自变量。

trans-unit.source: For example, the DLL import attribute <xref:System.Reflection.MethodImplAttributes.PreserveSig?displayProperty=nameWithType> must be added after the `PInvoke` method is created, if the method returns a value.
trans-unit.target: 例如，DLL 导入属性<xref:System.Reflection.MethodImplAttributes.PreserveSig?displayProperty=nameWithType>必须之后添加`PInvoke`创建方法后，如果该方法返回一个值。

trans-unit.source: The example shows how to do this.
trans-unit.target: 该示例演示如何执行此操作。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefinePInvokeMethod%2A> method to create a `PInvoke` method, and how to add the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodImplAttributes.PreserveSig?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag to the method implementation flags after you create the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder>, by using the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.GetMethodImplementationFlags%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetImplementationFlags%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> methods.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefinePInvokeMethod%2A>方法来创建`PInvoke`方法，以及如何添加<xref:System.Reflection.MethodImplAttributes.PreserveSig?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志设为在创建后的方法实现标志<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder>，通过使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.GetMethodImplementationFlags%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetImplementationFlags%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: To get a non-zero return value, you must add the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodImplAttributes.PreserveSig?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取非零返回值，必须添加<xref:System.Reflection.MethodImplAttributes.PreserveSig?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志。

trans-unit.source: The example creates a dynamic assembly with one dynamic module and a single type, `MyType`, that contains the `PInvoke` method.
trans-unit.target: 该示例创建一个动态模块和单个类型的动态程序集`MyType`，包含`PInvoke`方法。

trans-unit.source: The `PInvoke` method represents the Win32 `GetTickCount` function.
trans-unit.target: `PInvoke`方法表示 Win32`GetTickCount`函数。

trans-unit.source: When the example is run, it executes the `PInvoke` method.
trans-unit.target: 当运行示例时，它会执行`PInvoke`方法。

trans-unit.source: It also saves the dynamic assembly as PInvokeTest.dll.
trans-unit.target: 它还将为 PInvokeTest.dll 保存动态程序集。

trans-unit.source: You can use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to examine the `MyType` class and the `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) `PInvoke` method it contains.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)检查`MyType`类和`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)`PInvoke`它包含的方法。

trans-unit.source: You can compile a Visual Basic or C# program that uses the static `MyType.GetTickCount` method by including a reference to the DLL when you run csc.exe or vbc.exe; for example, `/r:PInvokeTest.dll`.
trans-unit.target: 你可以编译使用静态的 Visual Basic 或 C# 程序`MyType.GetTickCount`方法包括对 DLL 的引用，当你运行 csc.exe 或 vbc.exe; 例如， `/r:PInvokeTest.dll`。

trans-unit.source: For more information on custom modifiers, see the ECMA Partition II Metadata documentation.

trans-unit.source: The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site.
trans-unit.target: 可联机获取该文档；请参阅 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)和 Ecma International 网站上的[标准 ECMA-335 - 公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the [\], Type\[\], Type\[\], Type\[\]\[\], Type\[\]\<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefinePInvokeMethod%2A> method to create a `PInvoke` method, and how to add the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodImplAttributes.PreserveSig?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag to the method implementation flags after you create the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder>, by using the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.GetMethodImplementationFlags%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetImplementationFlags%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> methods.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 [\]，类型\[\]，类型\[\]，类型\[\]\[\]，类型\[\] \<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefinePInvokeMethod%2A > 方法来创建`PInvoke`方法，以及如何添加<xref:System.Reflection.MethodImplAttributes.PreserveSig?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志设为在创建后的方法实现标志<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder>，通过使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.GetMethodImplementationFlags%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetImplementationFlags%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The example creates a dynamic assembly with one dynamic module and a single type, `MyType`, that contains the `PInvoke` method.
trans-unit.target: 该示例创建一个动态模块和单个类型的动态程序集`MyType`，包含`PInvoke`方法。

trans-unit.source: The `PInvoke` method represents the Win32 `GetTickCount` function.
trans-unit.target: `PInvoke`方法表示 Win32`GetTickCount`函数。

trans-unit.source: To get a non-zero return value, you must add the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodImplAttributes.PreserveSig?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取非零返回值，必须添加<xref:System.Reflection.MethodImplAttributes.PreserveSig?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志。

trans-unit.source: The example uses an overload that does not specify custom modifiers.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用的重载，并不指定自定义修饰符。

trans-unit.source: To specify custom modifiers, change the example code to use this method overload instead.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定自定义修饰符，更改的示例代码以改为使用此方法重载。

trans-unit.source: When the example is run, it executes the `PInvoke` method.
trans-unit.target: 当运行示例时，它会执行`PInvoke`方法。

trans-unit.source: It also saves the dynamic assembly as PInvokeTest.dll.
trans-unit.target: 它还将为 PInvokeTest.dll 保存动态程序集。

trans-unit.source: You can use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to examine the `MyType` class and the `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) `PInvoke` method it contains.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)检查`MyType`类和`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)`PInvoke`它包含的方法。

trans-unit.source: You can compile a Visual Basic or C# program that uses the static `MyType.GetTickCount` method by including a reference to the DLL when you run csc.exe or vbc.exe; for example, `/r:PInvokeTest.dll`.
trans-unit.target: 你可以编译使用静态的 Visual Basic 或 C# 程序`MyType.GetTickCount`方法包括对 DLL 的引用，当你运行 csc.exe 或 vbc.exe; 例如， `/r:PInvokeTest.dll`。

trans-unit.source: When emitting code, a generic type parameter is represented by a <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.GenericTypeParameterBuilder> object rather than by a <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder> object.
trans-unit.target: 在发出代码时，由表示泛型类型参数<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.GenericTypeParameterBuilder>对象而不是<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder>对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the position of a type parameter in the type parameter list of the generic type that declared the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 获取声明参数的泛型类型的类型参数列表中的类型参数位置。

trans-unit.source: If the current <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder" /> object represents a generic type parameter, the position of the type parameter in the type parameter list of the generic type that declared the parameter; otherwise, undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder" /> 对象表示一个泛型类型参数，则为类型参数在声明它的泛型类型的类型参数列表中的位置；否则为未定义。

trans-unit.source: When emitting code, a generic type parameter is represented by a <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.GenericTypeParameterBuilder> object rather than by a <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder> object.
trans-unit.target: 在发出代码时，由表示泛型类型参数<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.GenericTypeParameterBuilder>对象而不是<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder>对象。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder> does not represent a generic type parameter, the value of this property is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder>不表示泛型类型参数，此属性的值是不确定。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.IsGenericType%2A> property to determine whether the current <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder> represents a generic type parameter.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.IsGenericType%2A>属性来确定是否当前<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder>表示泛型类型参数。

trans-unit.source: The constructed generic type whose constructor is returned.
trans-unit.target: 已返回其构造函数的构造泛型类型。

trans-unit.source: A constructor on the generic type definition of <c>type</c>, which specifies which constructor of <c>type</c> to return.
trans-unit.target: <c>type</c> 的泛型类型定义的构造函数指定要返回的 <c>type</c> 的构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the constructor of the specified constructed generic type that corresponds to the specified constructor of the generic type definition.
trans-unit.target: 返回与指定泛型类型定义的构造函数相对应的指定构造泛型类型的构造函数。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo" /> object that represents the constructor of <paramref name="type" /> corresponding to <paramref name="constructor" />, which specifies a constructor belonging to the generic type definition of <paramref name="type" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo" /> 对象，它表示与 <paramref name="constructor" /> 对应的 <paramref name="type" /> 的构造函数，它指定属于 <paramref name="type" /> 的泛型类型定义的构造函数 。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.GetConstructor%2A> method provides a way to get a <xref:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo> object that represents a constructor of a constructed generic type whose generic type definition is represented by a <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.GetConstructor%2A>方法使您能够获取<xref:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo>表示由其泛型类型定义构造的泛型类型的构造函数的对象<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder>对象。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose you have a <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder> object that represents the type `G<T>` in C# syntax (`G(Of T)` in Visual Basic, `generic <T> ref class G` in C++) and a <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ConstructorBuilder> object that represents a constructor of `G<T>`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假设你有<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder>对象，表示类型`G<T>`中 C# 语法 (`G(Of T)`在 Visual Basic 中，`generic <T> ref class G`在 c + +) 和一个<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ConstructorBuilder>表示的构造函数的对象`G<T>`。

trans-unit.source: Suppose that `G<T>` has a generic method with type parameter `U` that creates an instance of the constructed type `G<U>`.
trans-unit.target: 假设`G<T>`已具有类型参数的泛型方法`U`创建构造类型的实例`G<U>`。

trans-unit.source: In order to emit the code to create an instance of the constructed type, you need a <xref:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo> object that represents the constructor of this constructed type — in other words, that creates an instance of `G<U>`.
trans-unit.target: 若要发出代码以创建构造类型的实例，你需要<xref:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo>对象，表示此构造函数构造类型-换而言之，创建的实例`G<U>`。

trans-unit.source: To do this, first call the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.MakeGenericType%2A> method on the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder> object, specifying the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.GenericTypeParameterBuilder> object that represents `U` as the type argument.
trans-unit.target: 若要这样做，请先调用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.MakeGenericType%2A>方法<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder>对象，指定<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.GenericTypeParameterBuilder>对象，表示`U`作为类型参数。

trans-unit.source: Then call the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.GetConstructor%2A> method with the return value of the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.MakeGenericType%2A> method as parameter `type` and the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ConstructorBuilder> object that represents the constructor of `G<U>` as parameter `constructor`.
trans-unit.target: 然后调用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.GetConstructor%2A>方法的返回值替换<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.MakeGenericType%2A>作为参数的方法`type`和<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ConstructorBuilder>表示的构造函数的对象`G<U>`作为参数`constructor`。

trans-unit.source: The return value is the <xref:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo> object you need to emit the function call.
trans-unit.target: 返回值是<xref:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo>对象需要发出该函数调用。

trans-unit.source: The code example demonstrates this scenario.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示此方案。

trans-unit.source: The following code example contains source code for a generic class named `Sample` that has a type parameter named `T`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例包含一个名为的泛型类的源代码`Sample`具有一个名为的类型参数`T`。

trans-unit.source: The class has a field named `Field`, of type `T`, and a generic method named `GM` with its own type parameter, named `U`.
trans-unit.target: 此类具有名为的字段`Field`，类型的`T`，和一个名为的泛型方法`GM`包含其自身类型参数，名为`U`。

trans-unit.source: Method `GM` creates an instance of `Sample`, substituting its own type parameter `U` for the type parameter of `Sample`, and stores its input parameter in `Field`.
trans-unit.target: 方法`GM`创建的实例`Sample`，其自身类型参数替换`U`的类型参数`Sample`，并将存储在其输入的参数`Field`。

trans-unit.source: This source code is compiled but not used; you can view it with the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) and compare it to the code emitted by class `Example`.
trans-unit.target: 编译但不是使用此类源代码你可以查看其与[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)和将其与发出的类的代码比较`Example`。

trans-unit.source: The code in class `Example` demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.GetConstructor%2A> method to emit generic code.
trans-unit.target: 类中的代码`Example`演示如何使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.GetConstructor%2A>方法发出泛型的代码。

trans-unit.source: The `Main` method of class `Example` creates a dynamic assembly containing a class named `Sample` and uses the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineGenericParameters%2A> method to make it generic by adding a type parameter named `T`.
trans-unit.target: `Main`类的方法`Example`创建动态程序集包含一个名为类`Sample`并使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineGenericParameters%2A>方法，以使泛型通过添加一个名为的类型参数`T`。

trans-unit.source: A default constructor and a field named `Field`, of type `T`, are added to class `Sample`.
trans-unit.target: 默认构造函数和一个名为字段`Field`，类型的`T`，添加到类`Sample`。

trans-unit.source: A method `GM` is added and turned into a generic method by using the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.DefineGenericParameters%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 一种方法`GM`添加并通过使用转变为泛型方法<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.DefineGenericParameters%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The type parameter of `GM` is named `U`.
trans-unit.target: 类型参数`GM`名为`U`。

trans-unit.source: After the type parameter is defined, the signature of `GM` is added by using the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetSignature%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 定义类型参数后的签名`GM`通过使用添加<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetSignature%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: There is no return type and no required or custom modifiers, so all the parameters of this method are `null` except `parameterTypes`; `parameterTypes` sets the type of the method's only parameter to `U`, the method's generic type parameter.
trans-unit.target: 没有没有返回类型，并且无需或自定义修饰符，因此，所有此方法的参数是`null`除`parameterTypes`;`parameterTypes`设置到该方法的唯一参数的类型`U`，该方法的泛型类型参数。

trans-unit.source: The body of the method creates an instance of the constructed type `Sample<U>` (`Sample(Of U)` in Visual Basic), assigns the method's parameter to `Field`, and then prints the value of `Field`.
trans-unit.target: 方法的主体创建的构造类型的实例`Sample<U>`(`Sample(Of U)`在 Visual Basic 中)，将分配到该方法的参数`Field`，，然后输出的值`Field`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.GetConstructor%2A> method is used to create a <xref:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo> that represents the default constructor of the constructed generic type `Sample<U>` in the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Newobj?displayProperty=nameWithType> instruction that creates the instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.GetConstructor%2A>方法用于创建<xref:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo>，表示构造泛型类型的默认构造函数`Sample<U>`中<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Newobj?displayProperty=nameWithType>创建实例的指令。

trans-unit.source: A dummy type is defined to hold the entry-point method `Main`.
trans-unit.target: 定义一个虚拟类型以容纳入口点方法`Main`。

trans-unit.source: In the body of `Main`, the static `GM` method is invoked on the constructed generic type `Sample<int>` (`Sample(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic), with type <xref:System.String> substituted for `U`.
trans-unit.target: 正文中`Main`，静态`GM`方法调用的构造泛型类型上`Sample<int>`(`Sample(Of Integer)`在 Visual Basic 中)，与类型<xref:System.String>替换为`U`。

trans-unit.source: When the code example is run, it saves the emitted assembly as TypeBuilderGetFieldExample.exe.
trans-unit.target: 当运行时的代码示例时，它将发出的程序集保存为 TypeBuilderGetFieldExample.exe。

trans-unit.source: You can run TypeBuilderGetFieldExample.exe, and you can use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to compare the emitted code with the code for the `Sample` class that is compiled into the code example itself.
trans-unit.target: 你可以运行 TypeBuilderGetFieldExample.exe，并可以使用[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)要比较的代码发出的代码`Sample`编译到其自身的代码示例的类。
