trans-unit.target: 返回此类型声明的公共和非公共事件。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.EventInfo" /> objects representing the events declared or inherited by this type that match the specified binding flags.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.EventInfo" /> 对象的数组，表示此类型声明或继承的与指定的绑定标志匹配的事件。

trans-unit.source: An empty array is returned if there are no matching events.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有匹配的事件，则返回空数组。

trans-unit.source: Retrieve the type using <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and use reflection on the retrieved type.
trans-unit.target: 检索类型使用<xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和检索到的类型使用反射。

trans-unit.source: This method is not implemented for incomplete types.
trans-unit.target: 不会为不完整类型实现此方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns a field defined by the current <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回由当前 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder" /> 定义的字段。

trans-unit.source: The name of the field to get.
trans-unit.target: 要获取的字段的名称。

trans-unit.source: This must be a bit flag from <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> as in <see langword="InvokeMethod" />, <see langword="NonPublic" />, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 这必须是 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 中的位标志，类似于 <see langword="InvokeMethod" />、<see langword="NonPublic" /> 等中的位标志。

trans-unit.source: Returns the field specified by the given name.
trans-unit.target: 返回由给定名称指定的字段。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldInfo" /> object representing the field declared or inherited by this type with the specified name and public or non-public modifier.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldInfo" /> 对象，该对象表示由此类型声明或继承的具有指定名称和公共或非公共修饰符的字段。

trans-unit.source: If there are no matches then <see langword="null" /> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有匹配项，则返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Retrieve the type using <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and use reflection on the retrieved type.
trans-unit.target: 检索类型使用<xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和检索到的类型使用反射。

trans-unit.source: This method is not implemented for incomplete types.
trans-unit.target: 不会为不完整类型实现此方法。

trans-unit.source: The constructed generic type whose field is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回其字段的构造泛型类型。

trans-unit.source: A field on the generic type definition of <c>type</c>, which specifies which field of <c>type</c> to return.
trans-unit.target: <c>type</c> 的泛型类型定义的字段指定要返回的 <c>type</c> 的字段。

trans-unit.source: Returns the field of the specified constructed generic type that corresponds to the specified field of the generic type definition.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定的构造泛型类型的字段，该字段对应于泛型类型定义的指定字段。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldInfo" /> object that represents the field of <paramref name="type" /> corresponding to <paramref name="field" />, which specifies a field belonging to the generic type definition of <paramref name="type" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldInfo" /> 对象，它表示与 <paramref name="field" /> 对应的 <paramref name="type" /> 的字段，用于指定属于 <paramref name="type" /> 的泛型类型定义的字段。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.GetField%2A> method provides a way to get a <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo> object that represents a field of a constructed generic type whose generic type definition is represented by a <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.GetField%2A>方法使您能够获取<xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo>表示由其泛型类型定义构造的泛型类型的字段的对象<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder>对象。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose you have a <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder> object that represents the type `G<T>` in C# syntax (`G(Of T)` in Visual Basic, `generic <T> ref class G` in C++) and a <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.FieldBuilder> object that represents a field `public T F` in C# syntax (`Public F As T` in Visual Basic, `public: T F` in C++) that is defined by `G<T>`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假设你有<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder>对象，表示类型`G<T>`中 C# 语法 (`G(Of T)`在 Visual Basic 中， `generic <T> ref class G` c + + 中) 和一个<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.FieldBuilder>表示的字段的对象`public T F`中 C# 语法 (`Public F As T`在 Visual Basic 中，`public: T F`在 c + +) 由定义`G<T>`。

trans-unit.source: Suppose that `G<T>` has a generic method with type parameter `U` that creates an instance of the constructed type `G<U>` and calls field `F` on that instance.
trans-unit.target: 假设`G<T>`已具有类型参数的泛型方法`U`创建构造类型的实例`G<U>`和调用字段`F`该实例上。

trans-unit.source: In order to emit the function call, you need a <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo> object that represents `F` on the constructed type — in other words, that is of type `U` rather than type `T`.
trans-unit.target: 若要发出该函数调用，你需要<xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo>对象，表示`F`上构造的类型-换而言之，这是类型的`U`而不是类型`T`。

trans-unit.source: To do this, first call the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.MakeGenericType%2A> method on the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder> object, specifying the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.GenericTypeParameterBuilder> object that represents `U` as the type argument.
trans-unit.target: 若要这样做，请先调用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.MakeGenericType%2A>方法<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder>对象，指定<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.GenericTypeParameterBuilder>对象，表示`U`作为类型参数。

trans-unit.source: Then call the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.GetField%2A> method with the return value of the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.MakeGenericType%2A> method as parameter `type` and the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.FieldBuilder> object that represents `F` as parameter `field`.
trans-unit.target: 然后调用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.GetField%2A>方法的返回值替换<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.MakeGenericType%2A>作为参数的方法`type`和<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.FieldBuilder>对象，表示`F`作为参数`field`。

trans-unit.source: The return value is the <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo> object you need to emit the function call.
trans-unit.target: 返回值是<xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo>对象需要发出该函数调用。

trans-unit.source: The code example demonstrates this scenario.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示此方案。

trans-unit.source: The following code example contains source code for a generic class named Sample that has a type parameter named `T`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例包含一个名为示例具有一个名为的类型参数的泛型类的源代码`T`。

trans-unit.source: The class has a field named `Field`, of type `T`, and a generic method named `GM` with its own type parameter, named `U`.
trans-unit.target: 此类具有名为的字段`Field`，类型的`T`，和一个名为的泛型方法`GM`包含其自身类型参数，名为`U`。

trans-unit.source: Method `GM` creates an instance of `Sample`, substituting its own type parameter `U` for the type parameter of `Sample`, and stores its input parameter in `Field`.
trans-unit.target: 方法`GM`创建的实例`Sample`，其自身类型参数替换`U`的类型参数`Sample`，并将存储在其输入的参数`Field`。

trans-unit.source: This source code is compiled but not used; you can view it with the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) and compare it to the code emitted by class `Example`.
trans-unit.target: 编译但不是使用此类源代码你可以查看其与[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)和将其与发出的类的代码比较`Example`。

trans-unit.source: The code in class `Example` demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.GetField%2A> method to emit generic code.
trans-unit.target: 类中的代码`Example`演示如何使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.GetField%2A>方法发出泛型的代码。

trans-unit.source: The `Main` method of class `Example` creates a dynamic assembly containing a class named `Sample`, and uses the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineGenericParameters%2A> method to make it generic by adding a type parameter named `T`.
trans-unit.target: `Main`类的方法`Example`创建动态程序集包含一个名为类`Sample`，并使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineGenericParameters%2A>方法，以使泛型通过添加一个名为的类型参数`T`。

trans-unit.source: A default constructor and a field named `Field`, of type `T`, are added to class `Sample`.
trans-unit.target: 默认构造函数和一个名为字段`Field`，类型的`T`，添加到类`Sample`。

trans-unit.source: A method `GM` is added and turned into a generic method by using the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.DefineGenericParameters%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 一种方法`GM`添加并通过使用转变为泛型方法<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.DefineGenericParameters%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The type parameter of `GM` is named `U`.
trans-unit.target: 类型参数`GM`名为`U`。

trans-unit.source: After the type parameter is defined, the signature of `GM` is added by using the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetSignature%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 定义类型参数后的签名`GM`通过使用添加<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetSignature%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: There is no return type and no required or custom modifiers, so all the parameters of this method are `null` except `parameterTypes`; `parameterTypes` sets the type of the method's only parameter to `U`, the method's generic type parameter.
trans-unit.target: 没有没有返回类型，并且无需或自定义修饰符，因此，所有此方法的参数是`null`除`parameterTypes`;`parameterTypes`设置到该方法的唯一参数的类型`U`，该方法的泛型类型参数。

trans-unit.source: The body of the method creates an instance of the constructed type `Sample<U>` (`Sample(Of U)` in Visual Basic), assigns the method's parameter to `Field`, and then prints the value of `Field`.
trans-unit.target: 方法的主体创建的构造类型的实例`Sample<U>`(`Sample(Of U)`在 Visual Basic 中)，将分配到该方法的参数`Field`，，然后输出的值`Field`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.GetField%2A> method is used to create a <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo> that represents the field of the constructed generic type `Sample<U>` in the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Stfld?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Ldfld?displayProperty=nameWithType> instructions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.GetField%2A>方法用于创建<xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo>所表示的构造泛型类型的字段`Sample<U>`中<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Stfld?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Ldfld?displayProperty=nameWithType>说明。

trans-unit.source: A dummy type is defined to hold the entry-point method `Main`.
trans-unit.target: 定义一个虚拟类型以容纳入口点方法`Main`。

trans-unit.source: In the body of `Main`, the static `GM` method is invoked on the constructed generic type `Sample<int>` (`Sample(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic), with type <xref:System.String> substituted for `U`.
trans-unit.target: 正文中`Main`，静态`GM`方法调用的构造泛型类型上`Sample<int>`(`Sample(Of Integer)`在 Visual Basic 中)，与类型<xref:System.String>替换为`U`。

trans-unit.source: When the code example is run, it saves the emitted assembly as TypeBuilderGetFieldExample.exe.
trans-unit.target: 当运行时的代码示例时，它将发出的程序集保存为 TypeBuilderGetFieldExample.exe。

trans-unit.source: You can run TypeBuilderGetFieldExample.exe, and you can use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to compare the emitted code with the code for the `Sample` class that is compiled into the code example itself.
trans-unit.target: 你可以运行 TypeBuilderGetFieldExample.exe，并可以使用[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)要比较的代码发出的代码`Sample`编译到其自身的代码示例的类。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="type" /> does not represent a generic type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="type" /> 不表示泛型类型。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="type" /> is not of type <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="type" /> 的类型不是 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The declaring type of <paramref name="field" /> is not a generic type definition.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="field" /> 的声明类型不是一个泛型类型定义。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The declaring type of <paramref name="field" /> is not the generic type definition of <paramref name="type" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="field" /> 的声明类型不是 <paramref name="type" /> 的泛型类型定义。

trans-unit.source: This must be a bit flag from <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> : <see langword="InvokeMethod" />, <see langword="NonPublic" />, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 这必须是来自 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 的位标志：<see langword="InvokeMethod" />、<see langword="NonPublic" /> 等等。

trans-unit.source: Returns the public and non-public fields that are declared by this type.
trans-unit.target: 返回此类型声明的公共和非公共字段。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldInfo" /> objects representing the public and non-public fields declared or inherited by this type.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldInfo" /> 对象的数组，表示此类型声明或继承的公共和非公共字段。

trans-unit.source: An empty array is returned if there are no fields, as specified.
trans-unit.target: 按照指定，如果没有字段，则返回空数组。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.GetFields%2A> method does not return fields in a particular order, such as alphabetical or declaration order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.GetFields%2A>方法不返回字段按特定的顺序，如按字母顺序排列或声明顺序排列。

trans-unit.source: Your code must not depend on the order in which fields are returned, because that order can vary.
trans-unit.target: 因为该顺序可能会变化，你的代码必须不依赖于字段的返回顺序。

trans-unit.source: Retrieve the type using <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and use reflection on the retrieved type.
trans-unit.target: 检索类型使用<xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和检索到的类型使用反射。

trans-unit.source: This method is not implemented for incomplete types.
trans-unit.target: 不会为不完整类型实现此方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of <see cref="T:System.Type" /> objects representing the type arguments of a generic type or the type parameters of a generic type definition.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象的数组，表示泛型类型的类型变量或泛型类型定义的类型参数。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Type" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象数组。

trans-unit.source: The elements of the array represent the type arguments of a generic type or the type parameters of a generic type definition.
trans-unit.target: 此数组的元素表示泛型类型的类型自变量或泛型类型定义的类型参数。

trans-unit.source: The elements of the returned array are in the order in which they appear in the list of type parameters for the generic type definition.
trans-unit.target: 返回的数组的元素将泛型类型定义的类型参数列表中出现的顺序。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder> object represents a generic type definition if the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineGenericParameters%2A> method has been used to give it generic type parameters.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder>对象表示泛型类型定义，如果<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineGenericParameters%2A>已使用方法来为其提供的泛型类型参数。

trans-unit.source: This method retrieves the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.GenericTypeParameterBuilder> objects that represent the generic type parameters.
trans-unit.target: 此方法检索<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.GenericTypeParameterBuilder>表示泛型类型参数的对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information on generic types in reflection and a list of the invariant conditions for terms used in generic reflection, see the <xref:System.Type.IsGenericType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 反射和使用泛型反射中的术语的固定条件列表中的泛型类型的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Type.IsGenericType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object that represents a generic type definition from which the current type can be obtained.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象，该对象表示可从中获取当前类型的泛型类型定义。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object representing a generic type definition from which the current type can be obtained.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象，该对象表示可从中获取当前类型的泛型类型定义。

trans-unit.source: If you call the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.GetGenericTypeDefinition%2A> method on a <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder> object for which the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.IsGenericType%2A> property returns `true`, the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.GetGenericTypeDefinition%2A> property returns the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.GetGenericTypeDefinition%2A>方法<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder>为其对象<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.IsGenericType%2A>属性返回`true`、<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.GetGenericTypeDefinition%2A>属性返回当前实例。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder> that represents a generic type is always a generic type definition.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder>表示泛型类型始终是泛型类型定义。

trans-unit.source: If you used the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.MakeGenericType%2A> method to construct a generic type from a <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder> object that represents a generic type definition, using the <xref:System.Type.GetGenericTypeDefinition%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method on the constructed type gets back the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder> object that represents the generic type definition.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.MakeGenericType%2A>方法来构造泛型类型从<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder>对象，表示泛型类型定义，使用<xref:System.Type.GetGenericTypeDefinition%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法的构造类型获取回<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder>对象，表示泛型类型定义。

trans-unit.source: The current type is not generic.
trans-unit.target: 当前类型不为泛型。

trans-unit.source: That is, <see cref="P:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.IsGenericType" /> returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，<see cref="P:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.IsGenericType" /> 返回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The name of the interface.
trans-unit.target: 接口的名称。

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="true" />, the search is case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则搜索不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="false" />, the search is case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="false" />，则搜索区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: Returns the interface implemented (directly or indirectly) by this class with the fully qualified name matching the given interface name.
trans-unit.target: 返回由此类直接或间接实现的接口，该接口具有与给定接口名匹配的完全限定名。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object representing the implemented interface.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象，该对象表示实现的接口。

trans-unit.source: Returns null if no interface matching name is found.
trans-unit.target: 如果未找到名称匹配的接口，则返回 null。

trans-unit.source: Retrieve the type using <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and use reflection on the retrieved type.
trans-unit.target: 检索类型使用<xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和检索到的类型使用反射。

trans-unit.source: This method is not implemented for incomplete types.

trans-unit.target: 要为其检索映射的接口的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns an interface mapping for the requested interface.
trans-unit.target: 返回请求的接口的接口映射。

trans-unit.source: Returns the requested interface mapping.
trans-unit.target: 返回请求的接口映射。

trans-unit.source: Retrieve the type using <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and use reflection on the retrieved type.
trans-unit.target: 检索类型使用<xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和检索到的类型使用反射。

trans-unit.source: This method is not implemented for incomplete types.
trans-unit.target: 不会为不完整类型实现此方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of all the interfaces implemented on this type and its base types.
trans-unit.target: 返回在此类型及其基类上实现的所有接口的数组。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of <see cref="T:System.Type" /> objects representing the implemented interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象的数组，表示已实现的接口。

trans-unit.source: If none are defined, an empty array is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果未定义任何内容，则返回一个空数组。

trans-unit.source: The name of the member.
trans-unit.target: 成员名。

trans-unit.source: The type of the member to return.
trans-unit.target: 要返回的成员的类型。

trans-unit.source: This must be a bit flag from <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" />, as in <see langword="InvokeMethod" />, <see langword="NonPublic" />, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 这必须是 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 的位标志，例如 <see langword="InvokeMethod" />、<see langword="NonPublic" /> 等中的位标志。

trans-unit.source: Returns all the public and non-public members declared or inherited by this type, as specified.
trans-unit.target: 按照指定，返回此类型声明或继承的所有公共和非公共成员。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> objects representing the public and non-public members defined on this type if <paramref name="nonPublic" /> is used; otherwise, only the public members are returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 <paramref name="nonPublic" />，则返回 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> 对象的数组，表示在此类型上定义的公共和非公共成员；否则，仅返回公共成员。

trans-unit.source: Retrieve the type using <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and use reflection on the retrieved type.
trans-unit.target: 检索类型使用<xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和检索到的类型使用反射。

trans-unit.source: This method is not implemented for incomplete types.
trans-unit.target: 不会为不完整类型实现此方法。

trans-unit.source: This must be a bit flag from <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" />, such as <see langword="InvokeMethod" />, <see langword="NonPublic" />, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 这必须是来自 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 的位标志，例如 <see langword="InvokeMethod" />、<see langword="NonPublic" /> 等等。

trans-unit.source: Returns the members for the public and non-public members declared or inherited by this type.
trans-unit.target: 返回此类型声明或继承的公共和非公共成员。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> objects representing the public and non-public members declared or inherited by this type.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> 对象的数组，表示此类型声明或继承的公共和非公共成员。

trans-unit.source: An empty array is returned if there are no matching members.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有匹配的成员，则返回空数组。

trans-unit.source: Retrieve the type using <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and use reflection on the retrieved type.
trans-unit.target: 检索类型使用<xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和检索到的类型使用反射。

trans-unit.source: This method is not implemented for incomplete types.
trans-unit.target: 不会为不完整类型实现此方法。

trans-unit.source: The constructed generic type whose method is returned.
trans-unit.target: 已返回其方法的构造泛型类型。

trans-unit.source: A method on the generic type definition of <c>type</c>, which specifies which method of <c>type</c> to return.
trans-unit.target: <c>type</c> 的泛型类型定义的方法指定要返回的 <c>type</c> 的方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns the method of the specified constructed generic type that corresponds to the specified method of the generic type definition.
trans-unit.target: 返回与指定泛型类型定义的方法相对应的指定构造泛型类型的方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> object that represents the method of <paramref name="type" /> corresponding to <paramref name="method" />, which specifies a method belonging to the generic type definition of <paramref name="type" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 对象，它表示与 <paramref name="method" /> 对应的 <paramref name="type" /> 的方法，它指定属于 <paramref name="type" /> 的泛型类型定义的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.GetMethod%2A> method provides a way to get a <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> object that represents a method of a constructed generic type whose generic type definition is represented by a <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.GetMethod%2A>方法使您能够获取<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>对象，表示构造泛型类型，由表示其泛型类型定义的方法<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder>对象。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose you have a <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder> object that represents the type `G<T>` in C# syntax (`G(Of T)` in Visual Basic, `generic <T> ref class G` in C++) and a <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder> object that represents a method `T M()` in C# syntax (`Function M() As T` in Visual Basic, `T M()` in C++) that is defined by `G<T>`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假设你有<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder>对象，表示类型`G<T>`中 C# 语法 (`G(Of T)`在 Visual Basic 中， `generic <T> ref class G` c + + 中) 和<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder>表示的方法的对象`T M()`中 C# 语法 (`Function M() As T`在 Visual Basic 中，`T M()`在 c + +) 由定义`G<T>`。

trans-unit.source: Suppose that `G<T>` has a generic method with type parameter `U` that creates an instance of the constructed type `G<U>` and calls method `M` on that instance.
trans-unit.target: 假设`G<T>`已具有类型参数的泛型方法`U`创建构造类型的实例`G<U>`和调用方法`M`该实例上。

trans-unit.source: In order to emit the function call, you need a <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> object that represents `M` on the constructed type — in other words, that returns type `U` rather than type `T`.
trans-unit.target: 若要发出该函数调用，你需要<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>对象，表示`M`上构造的类型-换而言之，返回类型`U`而不是类型`T`。

trans-unit.source: To do this, first call the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.MakeGenericType%2A> method on the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder> object, specifying the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.GenericTypeParameterBuilder> object that represents `U` as the type argument.
trans-unit.target: 若要这样做，请先调用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.MakeGenericType%2A>方法<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder>对象，指定<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.GenericTypeParameterBuilder>对象，表示`U`作为类型参数。

trans-unit.source: Then call the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.GetMethod%2A> method with the return value of the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.MakeGenericType%2A> method as parameter `type` and the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder> object that represents `T M()` as parameter `method`.
trans-unit.target: 然后调用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.GetMethod%2A>方法的返回值替换<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.MakeGenericType%2A>作为参数的方法`type`和<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder>对象，表示`T M()`作为参数`method`。

trans-unit.source: The return value is the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> object you need to emit the function call.
trans-unit.target: 返回值是<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>对象需要发出该函数调用。

trans-unit.source: The code example demonstrates a scenario similar to this.
trans-unit.target: 代码示例演示一个类似于此方案。

trans-unit.source: The following code example contains source code for a generic class named `Sample` that has a type parameter named `T`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例包含一个名为的泛型类的源代码`Sample`具有一个名为的类型参数`T`。

trans-unit.source: The class has a field named `Field`, of type `T`, and a generic method named `GM` with its own type parameter, named `U`.
trans-unit.target: 此类具有名为的字段`Field`，类型的`T`，和一个名为的泛型方法`GM`包含其自身类型参数，名为`U`。

trans-unit.source: Method `GM` creates an instance of `Sample`, substituting its own type parameter `U` for the type parameter of `Sample`, and stores its input parameter in `Field`.
trans-unit.target: 方法`GM`创建的实例`Sample`，其自身类型参数替换`U`的类型参数`Sample`，并将存储在其输入的参数`Field`。

trans-unit.source: This source code is compiled but not used; you can view it with the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) and compare it to the code emitted by class `Example`.
trans-unit.target: 编译但不是使用此类源代码你可以查看其与[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)和将其与发出的类的代码比较`Example`。

trans-unit.source: The code in class `Example` demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.GetMethod%2A> method to emit generic code.
trans-unit.target: 类中的代码`Example`演示如何使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.GetMethod%2A>方法发出泛型的代码。

trans-unit.source: The `Main` method of class `Example` creates a dynamic assembly containing a class named `Sample` and uses the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineGenericParameters%2A> method to make it generic by adding a type parameter named `T`.
trans-unit.target: `Main`类的方法`Example`创建动态程序集包含一个名为类`Sample`并使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineGenericParameters%2A>方法，以使泛型通过添加一个名为的类型参数`T`。

trans-unit.source: A default constructor and a field named `Field`, of type `T`, are added to class `Sample`.
trans-unit.target: 默认构造函数和一个名为字段`Field`，类型的`T`，添加到类`Sample`。

trans-unit.source: A method `GM` is added and turned into a generic method by using the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.DefineGenericParameters%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 一种方法`GM`添加并通过使用转变为泛型方法<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.DefineGenericParameters%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The type parameter of `GM` is named `U`.
trans-unit.target: 类型参数`GM`名为`U`。

trans-unit.source: After the type parameter is defined, the signature of `GM` is added by using the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetSignature%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 定义类型参数后的签名`GM`通过使用添加<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.SetSignature%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: There is no return type and no required or custom modifiers, so all the parameters of this method are `null` except `parameterTypes`; `parameterTypes` sets the type of the method's only parameter to `U`, the method's generic type parameter.
trans-unit.target: 没有没有返回类型，并且无需或自定义修饰符，因此，所有此方法的参数是`null`除`parameterTypes`;`parameterTypes`设置到该方法的唯一参数的类型`U`，该方法的泛型类型参数。

trans-unit.source: The body of the method creates an instance of the constructed type `Sample<U>` (`Sample(Of U)` in Visual Basic), assigns the method's parameter to `Field`, and then prints the value of `Field`.
trans-unit.target: 方法的主体创建的构造类型的实例`Sample<U>`(`Sample(Of U)`在 Visual Basic 中)，将分配到该方法的参数`Field`，，然后输出的值`Field`。

trans-unit.source: A dummy type is defined to hold the entry-point method `Main`.
trans-unit.target: 定义一个虚拟类型以容纳入口点方法`Main`。

trans-unit.source: In the body of `Main`, the static `GM` method is invoked on the constructed generic type `Sample<int>` (`Sample(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic), with type <xref:System.String> substituted for `U`.
trans-unit.target: 正文中`Main`，静态`GM`方法调用的构造泛型类型上`Sample<int>`(`Sample(Of Integer)`在 Visual Basic 中)，与类型<xref:System.String>替换为`U`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.GetMethod%2A> method is used to create a <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> for the static `GM` method of the constructed generic type `Sample<U>`, and the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo.MakeGenericMethod%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method is then used to create a <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that can emitted in a method call.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.GetMethod%2A>方法用于创建<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>适用于静态`GM`构造的泛型类型的方法`Sample<U>`，和<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo.MakeGenericMethod%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法然后用于创建<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>，可以在方法调用中发出。

trans-unit.source: When the code example is run, it saves the emitted assembly as TypeBuilderGetFieldExample.exe.
trans-unit.target: 当运行时的代码示例时，它将发出的程序集保存为 TypeBuilderGetFieldExample.exe。

trans-unit.source: You can run TypeBuilderGetFieldExample.exe, and you can use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to compare the emitted code with the code for the `Sample` class that is compiled into the code example itself.
trans-unit.target: 你可以运行 TypeBuilderGetFieldExample.exe，并可以使用[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)要比较的代码发出的代码`Sample`编译到其自身的代码示例的类。

trans-unit.target: 包含要获取的嵌套类型的名称的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: A bitmask comprised of one or more <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> that specify how the search is conducted.

trans-unit.target: 检索类型使用<xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和检索到的类型使用反射。

trans-unit.source: If this type is complete, for example, if `CreateType` has been called on this type, but there are nested types that are not complete, then `GetNestedTypes` will only return those nested types for which `CreateType` has been called.
trans-unit.target: 如果此类型已完成，例如，如果`CreateType`已调用了这种类型，但存在嵌套的类型，然后不完整，`GetNestedTypes`将只返回这些嵌套的类型为其`CreateType`已调用。

trans-unit.source: This method is not implemented for incomplete types.

trans-unit.source: This must be a bit flag from <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" />, as in <see langword="InvokeMethod" />, <see langword="NonPublic" />, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 这必须是 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 的位标志，例如 <see langword="InvokeMethod" />、<see langword="NonPublic" /> 等中的位标志。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Type" /> objects representing all the types nested within the current <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that match the specified binding constraints.

trans-unit.target: 如果当前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 中未嵌套任何类型，或者如果没有一个嵌套类型与绑定约束匹配，则为类型 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 的空数组。

trans-unit.source: Retrieve the type using <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and use reflection on the retrieved type.

trans-unit.source: This method is not currently supported for incomplete types.

trans-unit.source: The name of the member to invoke.
trans-unit.target: 要调用的成员的名称。

trans-unit.source: This can be a constructor, method, property, or field.
trans-unit.target: 这可以是构造函数、方法、属性或字段。

trans-unit.source: A suitable invocation attribute must be specified.
trans-unit.target: 必须指定合适的调用属性。

trans-unit.source: Note that it is possible to invoke the default member of a class by passing an empty string as the name of the member.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，可以通过将一个空字符串作为成员的名称进行传递来调用一个类的默认成员。

trans-unit.source: The invocation attribute.
trans-unit.target: 调用属性。

trans-unit.source: This must be a bit flag from <see langword="BindingFlags" />.
trans-unit.target: 这必须是来自 <see langword="BindingFlags" /> 的位标志。

trans-unit.source: An object that enables the binding, coercion of argument types, invocation of members, and retrieval of <see langword="MemberInfo" /> objects using reflection.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，它使用反射启用绑定、参数类型的强制、成员的调用和 <see langword="MemberInfo" /> 对象的检索。

trans-unit.source: If binder is <see langword="null" />, the default binder is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果 binder 为 <see langword="null" />，则使用默认活页夹。

trans-unit.source: See <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Binder" />.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Binder" />。

trans-unit.source: The object on which to invoke the specified member.
trans-unit.target: 对其调用指定成员的对象。

trans-unit.source: If the member is static, this parameter is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果该成员为静态，则忽略此参数。

trans-unit.source: An argument list.
trans-unit.target: 参数列表。

trans-unit.source: This is an array of Objects that contains the number, order, and type of the parameters of the member to be invoked.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个对象的数组，该对象包含要调用的成员的参数的数量、顺序和类型。

trans-unit.source: If there are no parameters this should be null.
trans-unit.target: 如果不存在任何参数，则这应为 null。

trans-unit.source: An array of the same length as <c>args</c> with elements that represent the attributes associated with the arguments of the member to be invoked.
trans-unit.target: 与 <c>args</c> 长度相同的数组，其元素表示与要调用的成员的自变量关联的属性。

trans-unit.source: A parameter has attributes associated with it in the metadata.
trans-unit.target: 参数在元数据中具有与之相关联的属性。

trans-unit.source: They are used by various interoperability services.
trans-unit.target: 它们由不同的互操作性服务使用。

trans-unit.source: See the metadata specs for more details.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多详细信息，请参阅元数据规范。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see langword="CultureInfo" /> used to govern the coercion of types.
trans-unit.target: 用于控制类型强制的 <see langword="CultureInfo" /> 的实例。

trans-unit.source: If this is null, the <see langword="CultureInfo" /> for the current thread is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果这是 NULL，则使用当前线程的 <see langword="CultureInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: (Note that this is necessary to, for example, convert a String that represents 1000 to a Double value, since 1000 is represented differently by different cultures.)
trans-unit.target: （注意，这对于某些转换是必要的，例如，将表示 1000 的 String 转换为 Double 值，因为不同区域性的 1000 表示形式不同。）

trans-unit.source: Each parameter in the <c>namedParameters</c> array gets the value in the corresponding element in the <c>args</c> array.
trans-unit.target: <c>namedParameters</c> 数组中的每个参数获取 <c>args</c> 数组中对应元素的值。

trans-unit.source: If the length of <c>args</c> is greater than the length of <c>namedParameters</c>, the remaining argument values are passed in order.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>args</c> 的长度大于 <c>namedParameters</c> 的长度，则剩余的参数值将按顺序传递。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the specified member.
trans-unit.target: 调用指定的成员。

trans-unit.source: The method that is to be invoked must be accessible and provide the most specific match with the specified argument list, under the constraints of the specified binder and invocation attributes.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的活页夹和调用属性的约束下，要调用的方法必须为可访问，并且提供与指定的自变量列表最具体的匹配。

trans-unit.source: Returns the return value of the invoked member.
trans-unit.target: 返回被调用的成员的返回值。

trans-unit.source: A method will be invoked if the number of parameters in the method declaration equals the number of arguments in the specified argument list, and the type of each argument can be converted by the binder to the type of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 将调用一个方法，如果方法声明中的参数的数目等于在指定的自变量列表中，参数的数目和每个自变量的类型可以转换由参数的类型联编程序。

trans-unit.source: The binder will find all of the matching methods.
trans-unit.target: 联编程序将查找所有匹配的方法。

trans-unit.source: These methods are found based on the type of binding requested (BindingFlags.InvokeMethod, BindingFlags.GetProperties, and so on.).
trans-unit.target: 查找这些方法所基于的绑定请求 （BindingFlags.InvokeMethod、 BindingFlags.GetProperties，依次类推。） 的类型。

trans-unit.source: The set of methods is filtered by the name, number of arguments, and a set of search modifiers defined in the binder.
trans-unit.target: 按名称、 数量的参数和一组绑定器中定义的搜索修饰符进行筛选的方法集。

trans-unit.source: After the method is selected, it will be invoked.
trans-unit.target: 选择方法后，将调用它。

trans-unit.source: Accessibility is checked at that point.
trans-unit.target: 此时，检查可访问性。

trans-unit.source: The search can control which set of methods are searched based upon the accessibility attribute associated with the method.
trans-unit.target: 搜索可以基于与该方法关联的可访问性属性来控制搜索哪些方法集。

trans-unit.source: The `IBinder.BindToMethod` method is responsible for selecting the method to be invoked.
trans-unit.target: `IBinder.BindToMethod`方法负责选择要调用的方法。

trans-unit.source: The default binder selects the most specific match.
trans-unit.target: 默认的联编程序选择最精确的匹配。

trans-unit.source: Access restrictions are ignored for fully trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 访问限制会忽略完全受信任的代码。

trans-unit.source: That is, private constructors, methods, fields, and properties can be accessed and invoked using Reflection whenever the code is fully trusted.
trans-unit.target: 即私有构造函数、 方法、 字段和属性可以访问和使用反射，只要完全受信任代码调用。

trans-unit.source: This method is not currently supported.
trans-unit.target: 目前尚不支持此方法。

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve the type using <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and use reflection on the retrieved type.
trans-unit.target: 你可以检索类型使用<xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和检索到的类型使用反射。

trans-unit.source: This method is not currently supported for incomplete types.
trans-unit.target: 不完整类型目前不支持此方法。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a specified type can be assigned to this object.
trans-unit.target: 确定某个指定类型是否可以赋值给此对象。

trans-unit.source: The object to test.
trans-unit.target: 要测试的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a specified <see cref="T:System.Reflection.TypeInfo" /> object can be assigned to this object.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值表示是否可以将指定的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.TypeInfo" /> 对象赋值给此对象。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="typeInfo" /> can be assigned to this object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以将 <paramref name="typeInfo" /> 赋值给此对象，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The object to test.
trans-unit.target: 要测试的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a specified <see cref="T:System.Type" /> can be assigned to this object.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否可将指定的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 分配给此对象。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <paramref name="c" /> parameter and the current type represent the same type, or if the current type is in the inheritance hierarchy of <paramref name="c" />, or if the current type is an interface that <paramref name="c" /> supports.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="c" /> 参数和当前类型表示相同的类型，或当前类型位于 <paramref name="c" /> 的继承层次结构中，或当前类型是 <paramref name="c" /> 支持的接口，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> if none of these conditions are valid, or if <paramref name="c" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果上述条件均无效或 <paramref name="c" /> 为 <see langword="null" />；则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this object represents a constructed generic type.
trans-unit.target: 获取指示此对象是否表示构造的泛型类型的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this object represents a constructed generic type; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此对象表示构造泛型类型，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the current dynamic type has been created.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示是否已创建当前的动态类型。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType" /> method has been called; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已调用 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType" /> 方法，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType%2A> method has been called, the type represented by the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder> object is complete.
trans-unit.target: 后<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType%2A>方法已调用，表示的类型<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder>对象已完成。

trans-unit.source: Exceptions are thrown on any further attempts to add members or change other characteristics of the type.
trans-unit.target: 如果尝试将成员添加或更改该类型的其他特性，则将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The type of attribute to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的属性的类型。

trans-unit.source: Only attributes that are assignable to this type are returned.
trans-unit.target: 仅返回可分配给此类型的属性。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether to search this member's inheritance chain to find the attributes.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否搜索此成员的继承链以查找属性。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a custom attribute is applied to the current type.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否将自定义属性应用于当前类型。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if one or more instances of <paramref name="attributeType" />, or an attribute derived from <paramref name="attributeType" />, is defined on this type; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果针对此类型定义了 <paramref name="attributeType" /> 的一个或多个实例，或定义了从 <paramref name="attributeType" /> 派生的属性，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is not supported for incomplete generic type parameters.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不支持不完整的泛型类型参数。

trans-unit.source: Retrieve the type using <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and use reflection on the retrieved type.
trans-unit.target: 检索类型使用<xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和检索到的类型使用反射。

trans-unit.source: This method is not currently supported for incomplete types.
trans-unit.target: 不完整类型目前不支持此方法。

trans-unit.source: Retrieve the type using <see cref="M:System.Type.GetType" /> and call <see cref="M:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.IsDefined(System.Type,System.Boolean)" /> on the returned <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="M:System.Type.GetType" /> 检索此类型，并对返回的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 调用 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.IsDefined(System.Type,System.Boolean)" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="attributeType" /> is not defined.
trans-unit.target: 未定义 <paramref name="attributeType" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="attributeType" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="attributeType" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current type is a generic type parameter.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示当前类型是否是泛型类型参数。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder" /> object represents a generic type parameter; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder" /> 对象表示泛型类型参数，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When emitting code, a generic type parameter is represented by a <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.GenericTypeParameterBuilder> object rather than by a <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder> object.
trans-unit.target: 在发出代码时，由表示泛型类型参数<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.GenericTypeParameterBuilder>对象而不是<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder>对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current type is a generic type.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示当前类型是否是泛型类型。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the type represented by the current <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder" /> object is generic; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder" /> 对象表示的类型是泛型，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder> object represents a generic type definition if the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineGenericParameters%2A> method has been used to give it generic type parameters.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder>对象表示泛型类型定义，如果<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineGenericParameters%2A>已使用方法来为其提供的泛型类型参数。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder> class that is generic is always a generic type definition.
trans-unit.target: 实例<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder>是泛型的类始终是一个泛型类型定义。

trans-unit.source: For more information on generic types in reflection and a list of the invariant conditions for terms used in generic reflection, see the <xref:System.Type.IsGenericType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 反射和使用泛型反射中的术语的固定条件列表中的泛型类型的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Type.IsGenericType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder" /> represents a generic type definition from which other generic types can be constructed.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示当前 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder" /> 是否表示可以用来构造其他泛型类型的泛型类型定义。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder" /> object represents a generic type definition; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder" /> 对象表示泛型类型定义，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder> object represents a generic type definition if the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineGenericParameters%2A> method has been used to give it generic type parameters.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder>对象表示泛型类型定义，如果<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineGenericParameters%2A>已使用方法来为其提供的泛型类型参数。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder> class that is generic is always a generic type definition.
trans-unit.target: 实例<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder>是泛型的类始终是一个泛型类型定义。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder> can be used to build generic type definitions, but not constructed generic types.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder>可用来生成泛型类型定义，但不是构造的泛型类型。

trans-unit.source: To get a constructed generic type, call the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.MakeGenericType%2A> method on a <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder> that represents a generic type definition.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取构造的泛型类型，调用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.MakeGenericType%2A>方法<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder>表示泛型类型定义。

trans-unit.source: For more information on generic types in reflection and a list of the invariant conditions for terms used in generic reflection, see the <xref:System.Type.IsGenericType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 反射和使用泛型反射中的术语的固定条件列表中的泛型类型的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Type.IsGenericType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the current type is security-critical or security-safe-critical, and therefore can perform critical operations.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示当前类型是安全-关键的还是安全-可靠-关键的，且因此是否可执行关键操作。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current type is security-critical or security-safe-critical; <see langword="false" /> if it is transparent.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前类型是安全关键的或安全可靠关键的，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果它是透明的，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.IsSecurityCritical%2A>, <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.IsSecuritySafeCritical%2A>, and <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.IsSecurityTransparent%2A> properties report the transparency level of the type, as determined by the common language runtime (CLR).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.IsSecurityCritical%2A>， <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.IsSecuritySafeCritical%2A>，和<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.IsSecurityTransparent%2A>属性报告的类型的透明度级别，由公共语言运行时 (CLR)。

trans-unit.source: The combinations of these properties are shown in the following table:
trans-unit.target: 下表中显示的这些属性的组合：

trans-unit.source: Security level
trans-unit.target: 安全级别

trans-unit.source: IsSecurityCritical
trans-unit.target: IsSecurityCritical

trans-unit.source: IsSecuritySafeCritical
trans-unit.target: IsSecurityCritical

trans-unit.source: IsSecurityTransparent
trans-unit.target: IsSecurityTransparent

trans-unit.source: Critical
trans-unit.target: 严重

trans-unit.source: Safe-critical
trans-unit.target: 安全-关键

trans-unit.source: Transparent
trans-unit.target: 透明

trans-unit.source: Using these properties is much simpler than examining the security annotations of an assembly and its types, checking the current trust level, and attempting to duplicate the runtime's rules.
trans-unit.target: 使用这些属性比检查程序集及其类型的安全批注、检查当前的信任级别，以及尝试复制运行时的规则要简单得多。

trans-unit.source: The runtime begins evaluating transparency levels at the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 运行时开始计算在程序集的透明度级别。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the dynamic assembly is security-critical, annotations on types are ignored, and all types are security-critical.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果动态程序集是安全关键，类型上的注释将被忽略，并且所有类型都是安全关键。

trans-unit.source: By default, a dynamic assembly inherits the transparency of the assembly that emits it.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，动态程序集继承发出它的程序集的透明度。

trans-unit.source: You can override this default by using the <xref:System.AppDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly%28System.Reflection.AssemblyName%2CSystem.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilderAccess%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.Reflection.Emit.CustomAttributeBuilder%7D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.AppDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly%28System.Reflection.AssemblyName%2CSystem.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilderAccess%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.Reflection.Emit.CustomAttributeBuilder%7D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>, or <xref:System.AppDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly%28System.Reflection.AssemblyName%2CSystem.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilderAccess%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Security.Policy.Evidence%2CSystem.Security.PermissionSet%2CSystem.Security.PermissionSet%2CSystem.Security.PermissionSet%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.Reflection.Emit.CustomAttributeBuilder%7D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method overload and specifying security attributes.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用重写此默认设置<xref:System.AppDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly%28System.Reflection.AssemblyName%2CSystem.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilderAccess%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.Reflection.Emit.CustomAttributeBuilder%7D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.AppDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly%28System.Reflection.AssemblyName%2CSystem.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilderAccess%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.Reflection.Emit.CustomAttributeBuilder%7D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>，或<xref:System.AppDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly%28System.Reflection.AssemblyName%2CSystem.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilderAccess%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Security.Policy.Evidence%2CSystem.Security.PermissionSet%2CSystem.Security.PermissionSet%2CSystem.Security.PermissionSet%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.Reflection.Emit.CustomAttributeBuilder%7D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法重载并指定安全特性。

trans-unit.source: You cannot elevate security levels by doing this; that is, transparent code cannot emit security-critical or security-safe-critical code.
trans-unit.target: 不能通过执行此操作; 操作提升安全级别也就是说，透明代码不能发出安全关键或安全可靠关键代码。

trans-unit.source: Attributes must be specified when the dynamic assembly is created, or they do not take effect until the assembly has been saved to disk and reloaded.
trans-unit.target: 创建动态程序集时，或直到已保存到磁盘并重新加载程序集不会生效，必须指定属性。

trans-unit.source: Default inheritance is limited to the runtime's evaluation of transparency.
trans-unit.target: 默认继承被限制为运行时的评估的透明度。

trans-unit.source: No attributes are applied to the dynamic assembly.
trans-unit.target: 没有特性随即应用于动态程序集。

trans-unit.source: If you want to add security attributes, you must apply them yourself.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要添加的安全属性，你必须自行应用它们。

trans-unit.source: For more information about reflection emit and transparency, see [Security Issues in Reflection Emit](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关反射发出和透明度，请参阅[反射发出中的安全问题](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md)。

trans-unit.source: For information about transparency, see [Security Changes](~/docs/framework/security/security-changes.md).
trans-unit.target: 透明度有关的信息，请参阅[安全更改](~/docs/framework/security/security-changes.md)。

trans-unit.source: The current dynamic type has not been created by calling the <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 当前动态类型不是通过调用 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType" /> 方法创建的。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the current type is security-safe-critical; that is, whether it can perform critical operations and can be accessed by transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示当前类型是否为安全-可靠-关键，即它是否可执行关键操作且可由透明代码访问。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current type is security-safe-critical; <see langword="false" /> if it is security-critical or transparent.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前类型是安全可靠关键的，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果它是安全关键的或透明的，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.IsSecurityCritical%2A>, <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.IsSecuritySafeCritical%2A>, and <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.IsSecurityTransparent%2A> properties report the transparency level of the type, as determined by the common language runtime (CLR).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.IsSecurityCritical%2A>， <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.IsSecuritySafeCritical%2A>，和<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.IsSecurityTransparent%2A>属性报告的类型的透明度级别，由公共语言运行时 (CLR)。

trans-unit.source: The combinations of these properties are shown in the following table:
trans-unit.target: 下表中显示的这些属性的组合：

trans-unit.source: Security level
trans-unit.target: 安全级别

trans-unit.source: IsSecurityCritical
trans-unit.target: IsSecurityCritical

trans-unit.source: IsSecuritySafeCritical
trans-unit.target: IsSecurityCritical

trans-unit.source: IsSecurityTransparent
trans-unit.target: IsSecurityTransparent

trans-unit.source: Critical
trans-unit.target: 严重

trans-unit.source: Safe-critical
trans-unit.target: 安全-关键

trans-unit.source: Transparent
trans-unit.target: 透明

trans-unit.source: Using these properties is much simpler than examining the security annotations of an assembly and its types, checking the current trust level, and attempting to duplicate the runtime's rules.
trans-unit.target: 使用这些属性比检查程序集及其类型的安全批注、检查当前的信任级别，以及尝试复制运行时的规则要简单得多。

trans-unit.source: The runtime begins evaluating transparency levels at the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 运行时开始计算在程序集的透明度级别。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the dynamic assembly is security-critical, annotations on types are ignored, and all types are security-critical.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果动态程序集是安全关键，类型上的注释将被忽略，并且所有类型都是安全关键。

trans-unit.source: By default, a dynamic assembly inherits the transparency of the assembly that emits it.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，动态程序集继承发出它的程序集的透明度。

trans-unit.source: You can override this default by using the <xref:System.AppDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly%28System.Reflection.AssemblyName%2CSystem.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilderAccess%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.Reflection.Emit.CustomAttributeBuilder%7D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.AppDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly%28System.Reflection.AssemblyName%2CSystem.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilderAccess%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.Reflection.Emit.CustomAttributeBuilder%7D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>, or <xref:System.AppDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly%28System.Reflection.AssemblyName%2CSystem.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilderAccess%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Security.Policy.Evidence%2CSystem.Security.PermissionSet%2CSystem.Security.PermissionSet%2CSystem.Security.PermissionSet%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.Reflection.Emit.CustomAttributeBuilder%7D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method overload and specifying security attributes.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用重写此默认设置<xref:System.AppDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly%28System.Reflection.AssemblyName%2CSystem.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilderAccess%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.Reflection.Emit.CustomAttributeBuilder%7D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.AppDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly%28System.Reflection.AssemblyName%2CSystem.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilderAccess%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.Reflection.Emit.CustomAttributeBuilder%7D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>，或<xref:System.AppDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly%28System.Reflection.AssemblyName%2CSystem.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilderAccess%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Security.Policy.Evidence%2CSystem.Security.PermissionSet%2CSystem.Security.PermissionSet%2CSystem.Security.PermissionSet%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.Reflection.Emit.CustomAttributeBuilder%7D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法重载并指定安全特性。

trans-unit.source: You cannot elevate security levels by doing this; that is, transparent code cannot emit security-critical or security-safe-critical code.
trans-unit.target: 不能通过执行此操作; 操作提升安全级别也就是说，透明代码不能发出安全关键或安全可靠关键代码。

trans-unit.source: Attributes must be specified when the dynamic assembly is created, or they do not take effect until the assembly has been saved to disk and reloaded.
trans-unit.target: 创建动态程序集时，或直到已保存到磁盘并重新加载程序集不会生效，必须指定属性。

trans-unit.source: Default inheritance is limited to the runtime's evaluation of transparency.
trans-unit.target: 默认继承被限制为运行时的评估的透明度。

trans-unit.source: No attributes are applied to the dynamic assembly.
trans-unit.target: 没有特性随即应用于动态程序集。

trans-unit.source: If you want to add security attributes, you must apply them yourself.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要添加的安全属性，你必须自行应用它们。

trans-unit.source: For more information about reflection emit and transparency, see [Security Issues in Reflection Emit](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关反射发出和透明度，请参阅[反射发出中的安全问题](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md)。

trans-unit.source: For information about transparency, see [Security Changes](~/docs/framework/security/security-changes.md).
trans-unit.target: 透明度有关的信息，请参阅[安全更改](~/docs/framework/security/security-changes.md)。

trans-unit.source: The current dynamic type has not been created by calling the <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 当前动态类型不是通过调用 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType" /> 方法创建的。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the current type is transparent, and therefore cannot perform critical operations.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示当前类型是否透明，且因此是否无法指定关键操作。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the type is security-transparent; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果类型是安全透明的，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.IsSecurityCritical%2A>, <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.IsSecuritySafeCritical%2A>, and <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.IsSecurityTransparent%2A> properties report the transparency level of the type, as determined by the common language runtime (CLR).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.IsSecurityCritical%2A>， <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.IsSecuritySafeCritical%2A>，和<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.IsSecurityTransparent%2A>属性报告的类型的透明度级别，由公共语言运行时 (CLR)。

trans-unit.source: Critical
trans-unit.target: 严重

trans-unit.target: 安全-关键

trans-unit.source: Transparent
trans-unit.target: 透明

trans-unit.source: The current dynamic type has not been created by calling the <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 当前动态类型不是通过调用 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType" /> 方法创建的。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that is to be checked.
trans-unit.target: 要检查的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this type is derived from a specified type.
trans-unit.target: 确定此类型是否派生自指定类型。

trans-unit.source: Read-only.
trans-unit.target: 只读。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if this type is the same as the type <paramref name="c" />, or is a subtype of type <paramref name="c" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此类型与类型 <paramref name="c" /> 相同或为类型 <paramref name="c" /> 的子类型，则返回 <see langword="true" />；否则返回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object that represents an array of the current type.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示当前类型的数组的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object that represents a one-dimensional array of the current type, with a lower bound of zero.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象，该对象表示当前类型的一维数组（下限为零）。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object representing a one-dimensional array type whose element type is the current type, with a lower bound of zero.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象，该对象表示一维数组类型，其元素类型为当前类型（下限为零）。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.MakeArrayType%2A> method provides a way to generate an array type with any possible element type, including generic types.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.MakeArrayType%2A>方法使您能够生成具有任何可能的元素类型，包括泛型类型的数组类型。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a dynamic module, an abstract type named `Sample`, and an abstract method named `TestMethod`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建一个动态模块，名为抽象类型`Sample`，和一个名为的抽象方法`TestMethod`。

trans-unit.source: `TestMethod` takes a `ref` parameter (`ByRef` in Visual Basic) of type `Sample`, a pointer to type `Sample`, and an array of type `Sample`.
trans-unit.target: `TestMethod` 采用`ref`参数 (`ByRef`在 Visual Basic 中) 的类型`Sample`，指向类型的指针`Sample`，和类型的数组`Sample`。

trans-unit.source: It returns a two-dimensional array of type `Sample`.
trans-unit.target: 它将返回类型的一个二维数组`Sample`。

trans-unit.source: The code example saves the dynamic module to disk, so you can examine it with the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md).
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将动态模块保存到磁盘，以便你可以检查其与[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)。

trans-unit.source: The number of dimensions for the array.
trans-unit.target: 数组的维数。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object that represents an array of the current type, with the specified number of dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象，此对象表示当前类型的具有指定维数的数组。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object that represents a one-dimensional array of the current type.
trans-unit.target: 表示当前类型的一维数组的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.MakeArrayType%2A> method provides a way to generate an array type with any possible element type, including generic types.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.MakeArrayType%2A>方法使您能够生成具有任何可能的元素类型，包括泛型类型的数组类型。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a dynamic module, an abstract type named `Sample`, and an abstract method named `TestMethod`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建一个动态模块，名为抽象类型`Sample`，和一个名为的抽象方法`TestMethod`。

trans-unit.source: `TestMethod` takes a `ref` parameter (`ByRef` in Visual Basic) of type `Sample`, a pointer to type `Sample`, and an array of type `Sample`.
trans-unit.target: `TestMethod` 采用`ref`参数 (`ByRef`在 Visual Basic 中) 的类型`Sample`，指向类型的指针`Sample`，和类型的数组`Sample`。

trans-unit.source: It returns a two-dimensional array of type `Sample`.
trans-unit.target: 它将返回类型的一个二维数组`Sample`。

trans-unit.source: The code example saves the dynamic module to disk, so you can examine it with the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md).
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将动态模块保存到磁盘，以便你可以检查其与[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rank" /> is not a valid array dimension.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rank" /> 不是有效的数组维数。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object that represents the current type when passed as a <see langword="ref" /> parameter (<see langword="ByRef" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象，它在作为 <see langword="ref" /> 参数（Visual Basic 中的 <see langword="ByRef" />）传递时表示当前类型。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object that represents the current type when passed as a <see langword="ref" /> parameter (<see langword="ByRef" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象，它在作为 <see langword="ref" /> 参数（Visual Basic 中的 <see langword="ByRef" />）传递时表示当前类型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.MakeByRefType%2A> method provides a way to generate `ref` types (`ByRef` in Visual Basic) for parameter lists.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.MakeByRefType%2A>方法使您能够生成`ref`类型 (`ByRef`在 Visual Basic 中) 为参数列出。

trans-unit.source: Using Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) syntax, if the current <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder> represents `MyType`, then the type returned by this method would be `MyType&`.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 语法，当前<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder>表示`MyType`，则此方法返回的类型将`MyType&`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a dynamic module, an abstract type named `Sample`, and an abstract method named `TestMethod`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建一个动态模块，名为抽象类型`Sample`，和一个名为的抽象方法`TestMethod`。

trans-unit.source: `TestMethod` takes a `ref` parameter (`ByRef` in Visual Basic) of type `Sample`, a pointer to type `Sample`, and an array of type `Sample`.
trans-unit.target: `TestMethod` 采用`ref`参数 (`ByRef`在 Visual Basic 中) 的类型`Sample`，指向类型的指针`Sample`，和类型的数组`Sample`。

trans-unit.source: It returns a two-dimensional array of type `Sample`.
trans-unit.target: 它将返回类型的一个二维数组`Sample`。

trans-unit.source: The code example saves the dynamic module to disk, so you can examine it with the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md).
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将动态模块保存到磁盘，以便你可以检查其与[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)。

trans-unit.source: An array of types to be substituted for the type parameters of the current generic type definition.
trans-unit.target: 当前泛型类型定义的类型参数将要替代的类型数组。

trans-unit.source: Substitutes the elements of an array of types for the type parameters of the current generic type definition, and returns the resulting constructed type.
trans-unit.target: 将类型数组中的元素替换为当前泛型类型定义的类型参数，并返回生成的构造类型。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> representing the constructed type formed by substituting the elements of <paramref name="typeArguments" /> for the type parameters of the current generic type.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 表示的构造类型通过以下方式形成：用 <paramref name="typeArguments" /> 的元素取代当前泛型类型的类型参数。

trans-unit.source: Use this method when your emitted code requires a type constructed from the current generic type definition.
trans-unit.target: 当您发出的代码需要从当前泛型类型定义构造的类型时，请使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: It is not necessary to call the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType%2A> method before calling the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.MakeGenericType%2A> method on a <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder> that represents a generic type definition.
trans-unit.target: 不需要调用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType%2A>方法之前调用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.MakeGenericType%2A>方法<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder>表示泛型类型定义。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder> does not represent the definition of a generic type, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder>不表示泛型类型定义<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>引发。

trans-unit.source: The object returned by this method functions as a placeholder for a constructed generic type in your emitted code.
trans-unit.target: 返回此方法函数作为占位符中发出的代码构造的泛型类型的对象。

trans-unit.source: It is an instance of a class derived from <xref:System.Type> that has limited capabilities.
trans-unit.target: 它是派生自此类的实例<xref:System.Type>具有有限的功能。

trans-unit.source: In particular:
trans-unit.target: 具体而言：

trans-unit.source: To get methods, fields, and constructors for these constructed generic types, use the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.GetMethod%28System.Type%2CSystem.Reflection.MethodInfo%29>, <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.GetField%28System.Type%2CSystem.Reflection.FieldInfo%29>, and <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.GetConstructor%28System.Type%2CSystem.Reflection.ConstructorInfo%29> method overloads.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取有关这些构造的泛型类型的方法、 字段和构造函数，请使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.GetMethod%28System.Type%2CSystem.Reflection.MethodInfo%29>， <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.GetField%28System.Type%2CSystem.Reflection.FieldInfo%29>，和<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.GetConstructor%28System.Type%2CSystem.Reflection.ConstructorInfo%29>方法重载。

trans-unit.source: Two instances that represent the same constructed type do not compare as equal.
trans-unit.target: 表示相同的构造的类型的两个实例不比较结果为相等。

trans-unit.source: For example, in the following code `t1.Equals(t2)` returns `false`:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.MakePointerType%2A> method provides a way to generate pointer types for parameter lists.

trans-unit.source: Using Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) syntax, if the current <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder> represents `MyType`, then the type returned by this method would be `MyType*`.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 语法，当前<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder>表示`MyType`，则此方法返回的类型将`MyType*`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a dynamic module, an abstract type named `Sample`, and an abstract method named `TestMethod`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建一个动态模块，名为抽象类型`Sample`，和一个名为的抽象方法`TestMethod`。

trans-unit.source: `TestMethod` takes a `ref` parameter (`ByRef` in Visual Basic) of type `Sample`, a pointer to type `Sample`, and an array of type `Sample`.
trans-unit.target: `TestMethod` 采用`ref`参数 (`ByRef`在 Visual Basic 中) 的类型`Sample`，指向类型的指针`Sample`，和类型的数组`Sample`。

trans-unit.source: It returns a two-dimensional array of type `Sample`.
trans-unit.target: 它将返回类型的一个二维数组`Sample`。

trans-unit.source: The code example saves the dynamic module to disk, so you can examine it with the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md).
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将动态模块保存到磁盘，以便你可以检查其与[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)。

trans-unit.source: Sets the base type of the type currently under construction.
trans-unit.target: 设置当前正在构造的类型的基类型。

trans-unit.source: If `parent` is `null`, <xref:System.Object> is used as the base type.
trans-unit.target: 如果`parent`是`null`，<xref:System.Object>用作基类型。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, no exception is thrown if `parent` is an interface type, but a <xref:System.TypeLoadException> is thrown when the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，在引发任何异常`parent`是接口类型，但<xref:System.TypeLoadException>时，将引发<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType%2A>调用方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.SetParent%2A> method does not check for most invalid parent types.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.SetParent%2A>方法不会检查对于大多数无效的父类型。

trans-unit.source: For example, it does not reject a parent type that has no default constructor when the current type has a default constructor, it does not reject sealed types, and it does not reject the <xref:System.Delegate> type.
trans-unit.target: 例如，不会拒绝具有没有默认构造函数，如果当前类型具有默认构造函数，它也不会拒绝密封的类型，并且它也不会拒绝的父类型<xref:System.Delegate>类型。

trans-unit.source: In all these cases, exceptions are thrown by the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 在所有这些情况下，异常由引发<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType%2A>方法。
